package table;

import tools.Handler.BeanHandler;
import tools.Handler.BeanListHandler;
import tools.Handler.ScalarHandler;
import tools.JDBCTemplate;

import java.util.List;

/**
 * Project name(é¡¹ç›®åç§°)ï¼šDatabase_course_design_Java_Web_Implementation_of_student_information_management_system_based_on_MySQL
 * Package(åŒ…å): table
 * Class(ç±»å): Course
 * Author(ä½œè€…ï¼‰: mao
 * Author QQï¼š1296193245
 * GitHubï¼šhttps://github.com/maomao124/
 * Date(åˆ›å»ºæ—¥æœŸ)ï¼š 2022/1/31
 * Time(åˆ›å»ºæ—¶é—´)ï¼š 23:12
 * Version(ç‰ˆæœ¬): 1.0
 * Description(æè¿°)ï¼š è¯¾ç¨‹è¡¨
 */

public class Course
{
    /**
     * ç§æœ‰åŒ–æ„é€ å‡½æ•°ï¼Œç›®çš„æ˜¯ä¸è®©åˆ›å»ºå¯¹è±¡
     */
    public Course()
    {
    }

    /**
     * è·å¾—è¯¾ç¨‹åˆ—è¡¨
     *
     * @return List<data.Course>é›†åˆå¯¹è±¡
     */
    public static List<data.Course> getCourseList()
    {
        //sqlè¯­å¥
        String sql = "select * from course";
        //å‚æ•°ï¼Œæ— 
        Object[] objects = {};
        //æ‰§è¡Œsql
        List<data.Course> list = JDBCTemplate.queryForList(sql, new BeanListHandler<>(data.Course.class), objects);
        //è¿”å›ç»“æœ
        return list;
    }

    /**
     * è·å–è¯¾ç¨‹æ€»æ•°é‡
     *
     * @return Longå‹ï¼Œè¯¾ç¨‹æ€»æ•°é‡
     */
    public static Long getCourseCount()
    {
        Long count = 0L;
        //sqlè¯­å¥
        String sql = "SELECT COUNT(course.course_no) FROM course";
        //æ‰§è¡Œsqlè¯­å¥
        count = JDBCTemplate.queryForScalar(sql, new ScalarHandler<>());
        //è¿”å›ç»“æœ
        return count;
    }

    /**
     * æ ¹æ®è¯¾ç¨‹ç¼–å·è·å¾—è¯¾ç¨‹ä¿¡æ¯
     *
     * @return data.Courseå¯¹è±¡
     */
    public static data.Course getCourseInformation(Long course_no)
    {
        //sqlè¯­å¥
        String sql = "SELECT * FROM course WHERE course_no=?";
        //å‚æ•°
        Object[] objects = {course_no};
        //æ‰§è¡Œsqlè¯­å¥
        data.Course course = JDBCTemplate.queryForObject(sql, new BeanHandler<>(data.Course.class), objects);
        //è¿”å›ç»“æœ
        if (course.getCourse_no() == null)
        {
            return null;
        }
        return course;
    }

    /**
     * æ’å…¥ä¸€æ¡ç­çº§æ•°æ®
     *
     * @param course_no     è¯¾ç¨‹ç¼–å·
     * @param course_name   è¯¾ç¨‹åç§°
     * @param course_credit è¯¾ç¨‹å­¦åˆ†
     * @param course_hour   è¯¾ç¨‹å­¦æ—¶
     * @param course_mode   æ–¹å¼ï¼Œè€ƒè¯•æˆ–è€…è€ƒå¯Ÿ
     * @return æˆåŠŸåˆ™è¿”å›trueï¼Œå¤±è´¥è¿”å›false
     */
    public static boolean insert(Long course_no, String course_name, Float course_credit, Integer course_hour, String course_mode)
    {
        //sqlè¯­å¥
        String sql = "insert into course values (?,?,?,?,?)";
        //å‚æ•°
        Object[] objects = {course_no, course_name, course_credit, course_hour, course_mode};
        //æ‰§è¡Œsql
        int result = JDBCTemplate.update(sql, objects);
        //åˆ¤æ–­è¿”å›å€¼
        if (result > 0)
        {
            return true;
        }
        return false;
    }

    /**
     * æ›´æ–°è¯¾ç¨‹æ•°æ®ï¼Œä¸å¯æ›´æ–°è¯¾ç¨‹ç¼–å·
     *
     * @param course_no     è¦æ›´æ–°çš„è¯¾ç¨‹ç¼–å·
     * @param course_name   è¯¾ç¨‹åç§°
     * @param course_credit è¯¾ç¨‹å­¦åˆ†
     * @param course_hour   è¯¾ç¨‹å­¦æ—¶
     * @param course_mode   æ–¹å¼ï¼Œè€ƒè¯•æˆ–è€…è€ƒå¯Ÿ
     * @return æˆåŠŸï¼Œè¿”å›trueï¼Œå¤±è´¥è¿”å›false
     */
    public static boolean update(Long course_no, String course_name, Float course_credit, Integer course_hour, String course_mode)
    {
        //sqlè¯­å¥
        String sql = "UPDATE course SET course_name=?,course_credit=?,course_hour=?,course_mode=? WHERE course_no=?";
        //å‚æ•°
        Object[] objects = {course_name, course_credit, course_hour, course_mode, course_no};
        //æ‰§è¡Œsql
        int result = JDBCTemplate.update(sql, objects);
        //åˆ¤æ–­è¿”å›å€¼
        if (result > 0)
        {
            return true;
        }
        return false;
    }

    /**
     * åˆ é™¤è¯¾ç¨‹
     *
     * @param class_no è¯¾ç¨‹ç¼–å·
     * @return æˆåŠŸï¼Œè¿”å›trueï¼Œå¤±è´¥è¿”å›false
     */
    public static boolean delete(Long course_no)
    {
        //sqlè¯­å¥
        String sql = "delete from course where course_no=?";
        //å‚æ•°
        Object[] objects = {course_no};
        //æ‰§è¡Œsql
        int result = JDBCTemplate.update(sql, objects);
        //åˆ¤æ–­è¿”å›å€¼
        if (result > 0)
        {
            return true;
        }
        return false;
    }
}

H:\³ÌĞò\´óÈıº®¼Ù\Êı¾İ¿â¿Î³ÌÉè¼Æ_»ùÓÚmysqlµÄÑ§ÉúĞÅÏ¢¹ÜÀíÏµÍ³javaWebÊµÏÖ\\src\\main\\java\\table\\Customize.java
package table;

import io.ErrorLog;
import tools.Druid;

import java.io.PrintWriter;
import java.io.StringWriter;
import java.io.Writer;
import java.sql.*;

/**
 * Project name(é¡¹ç›®åç§°)ï¼šDatabase_course_design_Java_Web_Implementation_of_student_information_management_system_based_on_MySQL
 * Package(åŒ…å): table
 * Class(ç±»å): Customize
 * Author(ä½œè€…ï¼‰: mao
 * Author QQï¼š1296193245
 * GitHubï¼šhttps://github.com/maomao124/
 * Date(åˆ›å»ºæ—¥æœŸ)ï¼š 2022/2/11
 * Time(åˆ›å»ºæ—¶é—´)ï¼š 23:11
 * Version(ç‰ˆæœ¬): 1.0
 * Description(æè¿°)ï¼š è‡ªå®šä¹‰æŸ¥è¯¢
 */

public class Customize
{

    //æ‰§è¡Œä¸€æ¬¡åï¼Œæ˜¯å¦é”™è¯¯
    public static boolean isError = false;

    //é”™è¯¯ä¿¡æ¯
    private static String errorMessage = "";

    public static String getErrorMessage()
    {
        return errorMessage;
    }

    /**
     * æŸ¥è¯¢æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œæ­¤æ–¹æ³•ç”¨äºå°†ä¸€æ¡æˆ–è€…å¤šæ¡è®°å½•å°è£…æˆä¸€ä¸ªObjectçš„äºŒç»´æ•°ç»„å¹¶è¿”å›ï¼Œé€‚ç”¨äºå¤šè¡¨æŸ¥è¯¢
     *
     * @param sql é¢„ç¼–è¯‘çš„sqlæŸ¥è¯¢è¯­å¥ï¼Œç»å¸¸ä½¿ç”¨å¤šè¡¨æŸ¥è¯¢ï¼Œsqlè¯­å¥å®ä¾‹ï¼šæŸ¥è¯¢æŸå·å­¦ç”Ÿé€‰ä¿®çš„è¯¾ç¨‹åç§°å’Œå¯¹åº”è¯¾ç¨‹çš„åˆ†æ•°ï¼š
     *            SELECT course.`name`, grade.grade
     *            FROM grade, course WHERE grade.cno = course.cno AND grade.`no`=?
     * @return è¿”å›ä¸€ä¸ªObjectç±»å‹çš„äºŒç»´æ•°ç»„ï¼Œæ³¨æ„ï¼šäºŒç»´æ•°ç»„çš„ç¬¬ä¸€è¡Œä¸ºåˆ—çš„åç§°ï¼Œåœ¨ä¸Šä¸€ä¸ªä¾‹å­ä¸­ï¼Œ
     * åˆ—åæœ‰ä¸¤ä¸ªåˆ™Object[0][0]ç­‰äºcourse.`name`çš„åˆ—åï¼ŒObject[0][1]ç­‰äºgrade.gradeçš„åˆ—åï¼Œ
     * çœŸæ­£çš„æ•°æ®ä»è¡Œä¸‹æ ‡ä¸º1å¼€å§‹ã€‚è¡¨å†…å®¹çš„è¡Œæ•°ä¸ºObject[][]å¯¹è±¡.length-1ã€‚
     */
    public static Object[][] queryForArray(String sql)
    {
        //å…ˆè®¾ç½®æˆå¦
        isError = false;
        //å®šä¹‰ä¸€ä¸ªObjectç±»å‹çš„äºŒç»´æ•°ç»„
        Object[][] result = null;
        //è¿æ¥å¯¹è±¡
        Connection connection = null;
        //é¢„ç¼–è¯‘æ‰§è¡Œè€…å¯¹è±¡
        PreparedStatement preparedStatement = null;
        //ç»“æœé›†å¯¹è±¡
        ResultSet resultSet = null;
        try
        {
            //è·å–è¿æ¥å¯¹è±¡(Druidè¿æ¥æ± )
            connection = Druid.getConnection();
            //æˆ–è€…(è‡ªå®šä¹‰æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥æ± )ï¼š
            //connection = connectionPool.getConnection();
            //æˆ–è€…ç›´æ¥è·å–(è‡ªå®šä¹‰JDBCå·¥å…·ç±»)ï¼š
            //connection = JDBC.getConnection();

            //é¢„ç¼–è¯‘sqlï¼Œè¿”å›æ‰§è¡Œè€…å¯¹è±¡
            preparedStatement = connection.prepareStatement(sql, ResultSet.TYPE_SCROLL_SENSITIVE, ResultSet.CONCUR_UPDATABLE);
            //æ‰§è¡Œsqlè¯­å¥,è¿”å›ç»“æœé›†
            resultSet = preparedStatement.executeQuery();
            //å®šä¹‰è¡Œæ•°å’Œåˆ—æ•°
            int rows;
            int column;
            //é€šè¿‡ç»“æœé›†çš„å¯¹è±¡è·å–ç»“æœæºä¿¡æ¯å¯¹è±¡
            ResultSetMetaData metaData = resultSet.getMetaData();
            //é€šè¿‡æºä¿¡æ¯å¯¹è±¡è·å–åˆ—æ•°
            column = metaData.getColumnCount();
            //è·å–è¡Œæ•°
            //resultSet.afterLast();
            resultSet.last();
            rows = resultSet.getRow();
            //System.out.println(rows + "  " + column);
            //ç»“æœé›†å…‰æ ‡ç§»å›ç¬¬ä¸€è¡Œçš„å‰é¢
            resultSet.beforeFirst();
            //æ•°ç»„åˆ›å»ºï¼Œå› ä¸ºç¬¬ä¸€è¡Œä¸ºåˆ—çš„åç§°ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥è¡Œæ•°è¦åŠ ä¸€
            result = new Object[rows + 1][column];
            //å–å¾—åˆ—åç§°ï¼Œå¡«å……æ•°ç»„çš„ç¬¬ä¸€è¡Œ
            for (int i = 0; i < column; i++)
            {
                //è·å–åˆ—å
                String columnName = metaData.getColumnName(i + 1);
                result[0][i] = columnName;
            }
            int rowIndex = 1;
            //å¡«å……å…¶å®ƒæ•°æ®
            while (resultSet.next())
            {
                //å¾ªç¯éå†åˆ—æ•°
                for (int i = 0; i < column; i++)
                {
                    //è·å–åˆ—å
                    String columnName = metaData.getColumnName(i + 1);
                    //é€šè¿‡åˆ—åè·å–æ•°æ®
                    Object object = resultSet.getObject(columnName);
                    //System.err.print(object+" ");
                    //å¡«å……è‡³æ•°ç»„
                    result[rowIndex][i] = object;
                    //æˆ–è€…
                    //result[resultSet.getRow()][i] = object;
                }
                //è¡Œç´¢å¼•+1
                rowIndex = rowIndex + 1;
            }
        }
        catch (Exception e)
        {
            //äº§ç”Ÿé”™è¯¯
            e.printStackTrace();
            isError = true;
            //è·å¾—é”™è¯¯ä¿¡æ¯
            errorMessage = e.getMessage();
        }
        finally
        {
            //é‡Šæ”¾èµ„æº
            Druid.close(connection, preparedStatement, resultSet);
            //æˆ–è€…ï¼š
            //JDBC.close(connection, preparedStatement);
        }
        //è¿”å›ç»“æœ
        return result;
    }
}
ÿ

package table;

import data.LoginLog;
import tools.Handler.BeanListHandler;
import tools.Handler.ScalarHandler;
import tools.JDBCTemplate;

import java.text.SimpleDateFormat;
import java.util.Date;
import java.util.List;

/**
 * Project name(é¡¹ç›®åç§°)ï¼šDatabase_course_design_Java_Web_Implementation_of_student_information_management_system_based_on_MySQL
 * Package(åŒ…å): table
 * Class(ç±»å): Forum
 * Author(ä½œè€…ï¼‰: mao
 * Author QQï¼š1296193245
 * GitHubï¼šhttps://github.com/maomao124/
 * Date(åˆ›å»ºæ—¥æœŸ)ï¼š 2022/1/31
 * Time(åˆ›å»ºæ—¶é—´)ï¼š 23:13
 * Version(ç‰ˆæœ¬): 1.0
 * Description(æè¿°)ï¼š è®ºå›
 */

public class Forum
{
    //æ ¼å¼æ—¶é—´
    private static final SimpleDateFormat simpleDateFormat = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy/MM/dd  HH:mm:ss");
    //é¡µå¤§å°,é»˜è®¤ä¸º50æ¡ä¸€é¡µ
    private static final int PageSize;

    static
    {
        //è·å–åˆ†é¡µå¤§å°
        PageSize = io.Configuration.getForum_pageSize();
    }

    /**
     * ç§æœ‰åŒ–æ„é€ å‡½æ•°ï¼Œç›®çš„æ˜¯ä¸è®©åˆ›å»ºå¯¹è±¡
     */
    public Forum()
    {
    }

    /**
     * è·å¾—è®ºå›æ€»æ•°é‡
     *
     * @return è®ºå›æ€»æ•°é‡
     */
    public static Long getForumCount()
    {
        //sqlè¯­å¥
        String sql = "select count(forum_no) from forum";
        //å‚æ•°
        Object[] objects = {};
        //æ‰§è¡Œsql
        Long result = JDBCTemplate.queryForScalar(sql, new ScalarHandler<>(), objects);
        //è¿”å›ç»“æœ
        return result;
    }



    /**
     * æ’å…¥ä¸€æ¡è®ºå›ä¿¡æ¯
     *
     * @param forum_people_no è®ºå›å‘å¸ƒè€…çš„å­¦å·æˆ–èŒå·¥å·ï¼Œå½“å‘å¸ƒä¸å½“è¨€è®ºæ—¶ï¼Œå¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡æ­¤æ¶ˆæ¯å®šä½åˆ°æŸä¸ªäººï¼Œä¸å¯¹å¤–æ˜¾ç¤ºï¼Œå’Œå…¶å®ƒè¡¨ç‹¬ç«‹
     * @param forum_name      è®ºå›å‘å¸ƒè€…å§“å
     * @param forum_identity  è®ºå›å‘å¸ƒè€…èº«ä»½ï¼Œå­¦ç”Ÿï¼Œè€å¸ˆæˆ–è€…ç®¡ç†å‘˜
     * @param forum_content   è®ºå›æ–‡å­—å†…å®¹ï¼Œæœ€å¤§é•¿åº¦255å­—
     * @return æˆåŠŸï¼Œè¿”å›trueï¼Œå¤±è´¥è¿”å›false
     */
    public static boolean insert(Long forum_people_no, String forum_name, String forum_identity, String forum_content)
    {
        //è·å¾—æ—¶é—´
        Date date = new Date();
        //æ ¼å¼åŒ–æ—¶é—´
        String formatDate = simpleDateFormat.format(date);
        //sqlè¯­å¥
        String sql = "INSERT INTO forum (forum.forum_people_no,forum.forum_name,forum.forum_identity,forum.forum_time,forum.forum_content)" +
                " VALUES(?,?,?,?,?)";
        //å‚æ•°
        Object[] objects = {forum_people_no, forum_name, forum_identity, formatDate, forum_content};
        //æ‰§è¡Œsql
        int result = JDBCTemplate.update(sql, objects);
        //åˆ¤æ–­è¿”å›å€¼
        if (result > 0)
        {
            return true;
        }
        return false;
    }

    /**
     * åˆ é™¤ä¸€æ¡è®ºå›ä¿¡æ¯
     *
     * @param forum_no æ¥¼å±‚æˆ–è€…ç¼–å·
     * @return æˆåŠŸï¼Œè¿”å›trueï¼Œå¤±è´¥è¿”å›false
     */
    public static boolean delete(Long forum_no)
    {
        //sqlè¯­å¥
        String sql = "delete from forum where forum_no=?";
        //å‚æ•°
        Object[] objects = {forum_no};
        //æ‰§è¡Œsql
        int result = JDBCTemplate.update(sql, objects);
        //åˆ¤æ–­è¿”å›å€¼
        if (result > 0)
        {
            return true;
        }
        return false;
    }

    /**
     * æ ¹æ®æ€»æ¡æ•°è·å–é¡µé¢çš„æ€»å¤§å°ï¼Œç”¨äºåˆ†é¡µ
     *
     * @param count æ€»æ¡æ•°
     * @return é¡µé¢çš„æ€»å¤§å°
     */
    public static long getPageCount(Long count)
    {
        long PageCount = count % PageSize == 0 ? (count / PageSize) : (count / PageSize + 1);
        //ç›¸å½“äº
//        long PageCount = 0;
//        if (count % PageSize == 0)
//        {
//            PageCount = count / PageSize;
//        }
//        else
//        {
//            PageCount = count / PageSize + 1;
//        }
        return PageCount;
    }

    /**
     * è·å¾—å½“å‰é¡µçš„é›†åˆ
     *
     * @param PageCount é¡µæ€»æ•°
     * @param currPage  å½“å‰é¡µçš„åºå·
     * @return List<data.LoginLog>å¯¹è±¡
     */
    public static List<data.Forum> getThisPageList(Long PageCount, Long currPage)
    {
        //å½“å‰é¡µæ¯”æ€»æ•°è¿˜å¤§ï¼Œç›´æ¥è¿”å›
        if (currPage > PageCount)
        {
            return null;
        }
        //sqlè¯­å¥
        String sql = "SELECT * FROM forum order by forum_no desc  LIMIT " + ((currPage - 1) * PageSize) + "," + PageSize;
        //å‚æ•°
        Object[] objects = {};
        //æ‰§è¡Œsql
        List<data.Forum> list = JDBCTemplate.queryForList(sql, new BeanListHandler<>(data.Forum.class), objects);
        //è¿”å›
        return list;
    }
}

package table;

import tools.Handler.BeanListHandler;
import tools.Handler.ScalarHandler;
import tools.JDBCTemplate;

import java.text.SimpleDateFormat;
import java.util.Date;
import java.util.List;

/**
 * Project name(é¡¹ç›®åç§°)ï¼šDatabase_course_design_Java_Web_Implementation_of_student_information_management_system_based_on_MySQL
 * Package(åŒ…å): table
 * Class(ç±»å): LoginLog
 * Author(ä½œè€…ï¼‰: mao
 * Author QQï¼š1296193245
 * GitHubï¼šhttps://github.com/maomao124/
 * Date(åˆ›å»ºæ—¥æœŸ)ï¼š 2022/2/2
 * Time(åˆ›å»ºæ—¶é—´)ï¼š 20:19
 * Version(ç‰ˆæœ¬): 1.0
 * Description(æè¿°)ï¼š ç™»å½•æ—¥å¿—è¡¨,ä¸æä¾›ä¿®æ”¹å’Œåˆ é™¤åŠŸèƒ½
 */

public class LoginLog
{
    //æ ¼å¼æ—¶é—´
    private static final SimpleDateFormat simpleDateFormat = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy/MM/dd  HH:mm:ss");
    //é¡µå¤§å°,é»˜è®¤ä¸º100æ¡ä¸€é¡µ
    private static final int PageSize;

    static
    {
        //åŠ è½½åˆ†é¡µå¤§å°
        PageSize = io.Configuration.getLogin_log_pageSize();
    }

    /**
     * ç§æœ‰åŒ–æ„é€ å‡½æ•°ï¼Œç›®çš„æ˜¯ä¸è®©åˆ›å»ºå¯¹è±¡
     */
    public LoginLog()
    {
    }

    /**
     * è·å¾—ç™»å½•æ—¥å¿—åˆ—è¡¨ï¼Œä¸æ¨èä½¿ç”¨ï¼Œå› ä¸ºå¤ªå¤šï¼Œæ¨èä½¿ç”¨åˆ†é¡µçš„æ–¹æ³•
     *
     * @return List<data.LoginLog>å¯¹è±¡
     */
    public static List<data.LoginLog> getLogList()
    {
        //sqlè¯­å¥
        String sql = "select * from login_log order by log_no desc";
        //å‚æ•°ï¼Œæ— 
        Object[] objects = {};
        //æ‰§è¡Œsql
        List<data.LoginLog> loginLogs = JDBCTemplate.queryForList(sql, new BeanListHandler<>(data.LoginLog.class), objects);
        //è¿”å›å‚æ•°
        return loginLogs;
    }


    /**
     * è·å¾—æŸä¸ªäººçš„ç™»å½•æ—¥å¿—
     *
     * @param log_login_no ç™»å½•äººçš„å­¦å·æˆ–è€…ç¼–å·
     * @return List<data.LoginLog>å¯¹è±¡
     */
    public static List<data.LoginLog> getPeopleLogList(Long log_login_no)
    {
        //sqlè¯­å¥
        String sql = "select * from login_log where log_login_no=? order by log_no desc";
        //å‚æ•°
        Object[] objects = {log_login_no};
        //æ‰§è¡Œsql
        List<data.LoginLog> loginLogs = JDBCTemplate.queryForList(sql, new BeanListHandler<>(data.LoginLog.class), objects);
        //è¿”å›å‚æ•°
        return loginLogs;
    }

    /**
     * è·å¾—æ—¥å¿—æ€»æ•°é‡
     *
     * @return æ—¥å¿—æ€»æ•°é‡
     */
    public static Long getLogCount()
    {
        //sqlè¯­å¥
        String sql = "select count(log_no) from login_log";
        //å‚æ•°
        Object[] objects = {};
        //æ‰§è¡Œsql
        Long result = JDBCTemplate.queryForScalar(sql, new ScalarHandler<>(), objects);
        //è¿”å›ç»“æœ
        return result;
    }

    /**
     * æ’å…¥ä¸€æ¡æ—¥å¿—ï¼Œæ—¶é—´å’Œç¼–å·ç”±ç¨‹åºå¡«å……
     *
     * @param log_login_no ç™»å½•äººçš„å­¦å·æˆ–è€…ç¼–å·
     * @param log_name     ç™»å½•äººçš„å§“å
     * @return æˆåŠŸï¼Œè¿”å›trueï¼Œå¤±è´¥è¿”å›false
     */
    public static boolean insert(Long log_login_no, String log_name)
    {
        //è·å¾—æ—¶é—´
        Date date = new Date();
        //è·å¾—æ ¼å¼åŒ–çš„æ—¶é—´
        String dateformat = simpleDateFormat.format(date);
        //sqlè¯­å¥
        String sql = "insert into login_log (log_time,log_login_no,log_name) values(?,?,?)";
        //å‚æ•°
        Object[] objects = {dateformat, log_login_no, log_name};
        //æ‰§è¡Œsql
        int result = JDBCTemplate.update(sql, objects);
        //åˆ¤æ–­è¿”å›å€¼
        if (result > 0)
        {
            return true;
        }
        return false;
    }

    /**
     * æ ¹æ®æ€»æ¡æ•°è·å–é¡µé¢çš„æ€»å¤§å°ï¼Œç”¨äºåˆ†é¡µ
     *
     * @param count æ€»æ¡æ•°
     * @return é¡µé¢çš„æ€»å¤§å°
     */
    public static long getPageCount(Long count)
    {
        long PageCount = count % PageSize == 0 ? (count / PageSize) : (count / PageSize + 1);
        //ç›¸å½“äº
//        long PageCount = 0;
//        if (count % PageSize == 0)
//        {
//            PageCount = count / PageSize;
//        }
//        else
//        {
//            PageCount = count / PageSize + 1;
//        }
        return PageCount;
    }

    /**
     * è·å¾—å½“å‰é¡µçš„é›†åˆ
     *
     * @param PageCount é¡µæ€»æ•°
     * @param currPage  å½“å‰é¡µçš„åºå·
     * @return List<data.LoginLog>å¯¹è±¡
     */
    public static List<data.LoginLog> getThisPageList(Long PageCount, Long currPage)
    {
        //å½“å‰é¡µæ¯”æ€»æ•°è¿˜å¤§ï¼Œç›´æ¥è¿”å›
        if (currPage > PageCount)
        {
            return null;
        }
        //åè½¬å½“å‰é¡µï¼Œç›®çš„æ˜¯æ’åº
        //long reversePage = PageCount - currPage;
        //sqlè¯­å¥
        //String sql = "SELECT * FROM login_log  LIMIT " + (reversePage * PageSize) + "," + PageSize;
        //sqlè¯­å¥
        String sql = "SELECT * FROM login_log order by log_no desc  LIMIT " + ((currPage - 1) * PageSize) + "," + PageSize;
        //å‚æ•°
        Object[] objects = {};
        //æ‰§è¡Œsql
        List<data.LoginLog> list = JDBCTemplate.queryForList(sql, new BeanListHandler<>(data.LoginLog.class), objects);
        //è¿”å›
        return list;
    }
}

package table;

import tools.Handler.BeanHandler;
import tools.Handler.BeanListHandler;
import tools.Handler.ScalarHandler;
import tools.JDBCTemplate;

import java.text.SimpleDateFormat;
import java.util.Date;
import java.util.List;

/**
 * Project name(é¡¹ç›®åç§°)ï¼šDatabase_course_design_Java_Web_Implementation_of_student_information_management_system_based_on_MySQL
 * Package(åŒ…å): table
 * Class(ç±»å): News
 * Author(ä½œè€…ï¼‰: mao
 * Author QQï¼š1296193245
 * GitHubï¼šhttps://github.com/maomao124/
 * Date(åˆ›å»ºæ—¥æœŸ)ï¼š 2022/1/31
 * Time(åˆ›å»ºæ—¶é—´)ï¼š 23:13
 * Version(ç‰ˆæœ¬): 1.0
 * Description(æè¿°)ï¼š æ— 
 */

public class News
{
    //é¡µå¤§å°,é»˜è®¤ä¸º100æ¡ä¸€é¡µ
    private static final int PageSize;

    static
    {
        //è·å–é¡µå¤§å°
        PageSize = io.Configuration.getNew_pageSize();
    }

    /**
     * ç§æœ‰åŒ–æ„é€ å‡½æ•°ï¼Œä¸èƒ½åˆ›å»ºå¯¹è±¡
     */
    private News()
    {
    }

    public static int getPageSize()
    {
        return PageSize;
    }

    /**
     * æŸ¥è¯¢æ–°é—»
     *
     * @param new_no æ–°é—»ç¼–å·
     * @return data.Newså¯¹è±¡
     */
    public static data.News getNews(Long new_no)
    {
        //sqlè¯­å¥
        String sql = "SELECT * FROM news WHERE new_no=?";
        //å‚æ•°
        Object[] objects = {new_no};
        //æŸ¥è¯¢
        data.News news = JDBCTemplate.queryForObject(sql, new BeanHandler<>(data.News.class), objects);
        //è¿”å›
        if (news.getNew_no() == null)
        {
            //æ–°é—»ç¼–å·ä¸ºç©ºï¼Œè¿”å›null
            return null;
        }
        return news;
    }

    /**
     * è·å¾—æ–°é—»çš„æ€»æ•°é‡
     *
     * @return æ€»æ¡æ•°
     */
    public static Long getNewsCount()
    {
        //sqlè¯­å¥
        String sql = "SELECT COUNT(new_no) FROM news";
        //æŸ¥è¯¢
        Long news_count = JDBCTemplate.queryForScalar(sql, new ScalarHandler<>());
        //è¿”å›
        return news_count;
    }

    /**
     * æ’å…¥ä¸€æ¡æ–°é—»
     *
     * @param new_author   ä½œè€…
     * @param new_identity èº«ä»½
     * @param new_title    æ ‡é¢˜
     * @param new_text     æ­£æ–‡
     * @return æ’å…¥èº«ä»½æˆåŠŸï¼ŒæˆåŠŸåˆ™è¿”å›trueï¼Œå¤±è´¥è¿”å›false
     */
    public static boolean insert(String new_author, String new_identity, String new_title, String new_text)
    {
        //åº”è¯¥ç¡®ä¿æ•°æ®ä¸ä¸ºç©º
        if (new_author == null)
        {
            return false;
        }
        if (new_identity == null)
        {
            return false;
        }
        if (new_title == null)
        {
            return false;
        }
        if (new_text == null)
        {
            return false;
        }
        //è·å¾—æ—¶é—´ä¿¡æ¯
        Date date = new Date();
        //æ ¼å¼åŒ–æ—¶é—´
        SimpleDateFormat simpleDateFormat = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy/MM/dd  HH:mm:ss");
        //è·å¾—æ ¼å¼åçš„å­—ç¬¦ä¸²
        String time = simpleDateFormat.format(date);
        //System.out.println(time);
        //æ ¼å¼åŒ–å‚æ•°
        Object[] objects = {new_author, new_identity, time, new_title, new_text};
        //sqlè¯­å¥
        String sql = "insert into news (new_author,new_identity,new_time,new_title,new_text) values(?,?,?,?,?)";
        //å†™å…¥æ•°æ®åº“
        int result = JDBCTemplate.update(sql, objects);
        //åˆ¤æ–­è¿”å›å€¼
        if (result > 0)
        {
            return true;
        }
        return false;
    }

    /**
     * è·å¾—æ–°é—»æ¸…å•ï¼Œä¸åŒ…æ‹¬æ­£æ–‡ï¼ŒæŒ‰ç¼–å·é™åº
     *
     * @return List<data.News>å¯¹è±¡
     */
    public static List<data.News> getNewsList()
    {
        //sqlè¯­å¥
        String sql = "SELECT news.new_no,news.new_author,news.new_identity,news.new_time,news.new_title FROM news ORDER BY new_no DESC";
        //æŸ¥è¯¢
        List<data.News> list = JDBCTemplate.queryForList(sql, new BeanListHandler<>(data.News.class));
        //è¿”å›
        return list;
    }

    /**
     * è·å¾—ç¬¬næ¡æ–°é—»
     *
     * @param new_number æ•°å­—nï¼Œæ–°é—»æŒ‰ç¼–å·é™åºï¼Œæ•°å­—1åˆ™ä»£è¡¨è·å–æœ€æ–°ä¸€æ¡æ–°é—»ï¼Œæ•°å­—2ä»£è¡¨è·å–ç¬¬äºŒæ¡æ–°é—»ï¼Œç”¨äºé¡µé¢æ˜¾ç¤º
     * @return data.Newså¯¹è±¡ï¼ŒåŒ…æ‹¬æ­£æ–‡
     */
    public static data.News getNew(Long new_number)
    {
        //è·å¾—æ–°é—»æ€»æ•°
        long count = getNewsCount();
        //æ€»æ•°ä¸º0ï¼Œç›´æ¥è¿”å›null
        if (count == 0)
        {
            return null;
        }
        //ä¼ å…¥çš„ç¼–å·å¤§äºæ€»æ•°ï¼Œæˆ–è€…æ˜¯è´Ÿæ•°å’Œ0ï¼Œç›´æ¥è¿”å›null
        if (count < new_number || new_number <= 0)
        {
            return null;
        }
        long number = count - new_number;
        //sqlè¯­å¥
        String sql = "SELECT * FROM news LIMIT " + number + ",1";
        //System.out.println(sql);
        data.News news = JDBCTemplate.queryForObject(sql, new BeanHandler<>(data.News.class));
        //è¿”å›ç»“æœ
        if (news == null)
        {
            return null;
        }
        return news;
    }

    /**
     * åˆ é™¤ä¸€æ¡æ–°é—»
     *
     * @param new_no æ–°é—»ç¼–å·
     * @return åˆ é™¤æˆåŠŸï¼Œè¿”å›trueï¼Œåˆ é™¤å¤±è´¥è¿”å›false
     */
    public static boolean delete(Long new_no)
    {
        //sqlè¯­å¥
        String sql = "delete from news where new_no=?";
        //å‚æ•°
        Object[] objects = {new_no};
        //æ‰§è¡Œsql
        int result = JDBCTemplate.update(sql, objects);
        //è¿”å›ç»“æœ
        if (result > 0)
        {
            return true;
        }
        return false;
    }

    /**
     * æ ¹æ®æ€»æ¡æ•°è·å–é¡µé¢çš„æ€»å¤§å°ï¼Œç”¨äºåˆ†é¡µ
     *
     * @param count æ€»æ¡æ•°
     * @return é¡µé¢çš„æ€»å¤§å°
     */
    public static long getPageCount(Long count)
    {
        long PageCount = count % PageSize == 0 ? (count / PageSize) : (count / PageSize + 1);
        //ç›¸å½“äº
//        long PageCount = 0;
//        if (count % PageSize == 0)
//        {
//            PageCount = count / PageSize;
//        }
//        else
//        {
//            PageCount = count / PageSize + 1;
//        }
        return PageCount;
    }

    /**
     * è·å¾—å½“å‰é¡µçš„é›†åˆ
     *
     * @param PageCount é¡µæ€»æ•°
     * @param currPage  å½“å‰é¡µçš„åºå·
     * @return List<data.LoginLog>å¯¹è±¡
     */
    public static List<data.News> getThisPageList(Long PageCount, Long currPage)
    {
        //å½“å‰é¡µæ¯”æ€»æ•°è¿˜å¤§ï¼Œç›´æ¥è¿”å›
        if (currPage > PageCount)
        {
            return null;
        }
        String sql = "SELECT news.new_no,news.new_author,news.new_identity,news.new_time,news.new_title " +
                "FROM news ORDER BY new_no DESC LIMIT " + ((currPage - 1) * PageSize) + "," + PageSize;
        //å‚æ•°
        Object[] objects = {};
        //æ‰§è¡Œsql
        List<data.News> list = JDBCTemplate.queryForList(sql, new BeanListHandler<>(data.News.class));
        //è¿”å›
        return list;
    }

}

package table;

import tools.Handler.BeanHandler;
import tools.Handler.BeanListHandler;
import tools.Handler.ScalarHandler;
import tools.JDBCTemplate;

import java.text.DecimalFormat;
import java.util.List;

/**
 * Project name(é¡¹ç›®åç§°)ï¼šDatabase_course_design_Java_Web_Implementation_of_student_information_management_system_based_on_MySQL
 * Package(åŒ…å): table
 * Class(ç±»å): Score
 * Author(ä½œè€…ï¼‰: mao
 * Author QQï¼š1296193245
 * GitHubï¼šhttps://github.com/maomao124/
 * Date(åˆ›å»ºæ—¥æœŸ)ï¼š 2022/1/31
 * Time(åˆ›å»ºæ—¶é—´)ï¼š 23:13
 * Version(ç‰ˆæœ¬): 1.0
 * Description(æè¿°)ï¼š åˆ†æ•°è¡¨
 */

public class Score
{
    private static final DecimalFormat decimalFormat = new DecimalFormat("#.##");

    /**
     * ç§æœ‰åŒ–æ„é€ å‡½æ•°ï¼Œç›®çš„æ˜¯ä¸è®©åˆ›å»ºå¯¹è±¡
     */
    public Score()
    {
    }

    /**
     * æ ¹æ®æ¨¡å¼ï¼Œå¹³æ—¶æˆç»©å’Œè€ƒè¯•æˆç»©å¾—åˆ°æœ€ç»ˆæˆç»©
     *
     * @param mode        è€ƒæ ¸æ–¹å¼ï¼Œè€ƒè¯•æˆ–è€…è€ƒå¯Ÿ
     * @param usual_score å¹³æ—¶æˆç»©
     * @param end_score   è€ƒè¯•æˆç»©
     * @return æœ€ç»ˆæˆç»©
     */
    public static Float getFinalScore(String mode, Float usual_score, Float end_score)
    {
        //å¦‚æœè¾“å…¥çš„è¯¾ç¨‹æ˜¯è€ƒè¯•æ¨¡å¼
        if (mode.equals("è€ƒè¯•"))
        {
            //å¹³æ—¶æˆç»©å’Œè€ƒè¯•æˆç»©å››å…­å¼€
            return usual_score * 0.4f + end_score * 0.6f;
        }
        else
        {
            //è€ƒå¯Ÿ
            //å¹³æ—¶æˆç»©å’Œè€ƒè¯•æˆç»©å„å ä¸€åŠ
            return usual_score * 0.5f + end_score * 0.5f;
        }
    }

    /**
     * æ ¹æ®æœ€ç»ˆæˆç»©è·å¾—å¯¹åº”çš„ç»©ç‚¹
     *
     * @param final_score æœ€ç»ˆæˆç»©
     * @return ç»©ç‚¹
     */
    public static Float getGradePoint(Float final_score)
    {
        //ä¸åŠæ ¼ï¼Œåˆ™ç»©ç‚¹ä¸º0
        if (final_score < 60)
        {
            return 0f;
        }
        //ç»©ç‚¹=åˆ†æ•°/10-5
        return Float.valueOf(decimalFormat.format(final_score / 10 - 5));
    }

    /**
     * è·å¾—æˆç»©åˆ—è¡¨
     *
     * @return List<data.Score>å¯¹è±¡
     */
    public static List<data.Score> getScoreList()
    {
        //sqlè¯­å¥
        String sql = "select * from score";
        //å‚æ•°ï¼Œæ— 
        Object[] objects = {};
        //æ‰§è¡Œsql
        List<data.Score> list = JDBCTemplate.queryForList(sql, new BeanListHandler<>(data.Score.class), objects);
        //è¿”å›
        return list;
    }

    /**
     * è·å¾—æˆç»©æ€»æ•°
     *
     * @return æˆç»©æ€»æ•°
     */
    public static Long getScoreCount()
    {
        //sqlè¯­å¥
        String sql = "select count(no) from score";
        //å‚æ•°ï¼Œæ— 
        Object[] objects = {};
        //æ‰§è¡Œsql
        Long result = JDBCTemplate.queryForScalar(sql, new ScalarHandler<>(), objects);
        //è¿”å›
        return result;
    }

    /**
     * è·å¾—å­¦ç”Ÿçš„æˆç»©æ€»æ•°é‡
     *
     * @param no å­¦ç”Ÿå­¦å·
     * @return å­¦ç”Ÿçš„æˆç»©æ€»æ•°
     */
    public static Long getStudentScoreCount(Long no)
    {
        //sqlè¯­å¥
        String sql = "select count(no) from score where no=?";
        //å‚æ•°
        Object[] objects = {no};
        //æ‰§è¡Œsql
        Long result = JDBCTemplate.queryForScalar(sql, new ScalarHandler<>(), objects);
        //è¿”å›
        return result;
    }

    /**
     * è·å¾—æŸç§‘ç›®æˆç»©çš„æ€»æ•°
     *
     * @param course_no è¯¾ç¨‹ç¼–å·
     * @return è¯¥è¯¾ç¨‹ç¼–å·ç§‘ç›®æˆç»©çš„æ€»æ•°
     */
    public static Long getCourseScoreCount(Long course_no)
    {
        //sqlè¯­å¥
        String sql = "select count(no) from score where course_no=?";
        //å‚æ•°
        Object[] objects = {course_no};
        //æ‰§è¡Œsql
        Long result = JDBCTemplate.queryForScalar(sql, new ScalarHandler<>(), objects);
        //è¿”å›
        return result;
    }

    /**
     * æ’å…¥ä¸€æ¡æˆç»©ä¿¡æ¯
     *
     * @param no          å­¦ç”Ÿå­¦å·
     * @param course_no   è¯¾ç¨‹ç¼–å·
     * @param usual_score å¹³æ—¶æˆç»©
     * @param end_score   æœŸæœ«æˆç»©ï¼Œæˆ–è€…è€ƒè¯•æˆç»©
     * @param semester    å­¦æœŸ
     * @return æˆåŠŸï¼Œè¿”å›trueï¼Œå¤±è´¥è¿”å›false
     */
    public static boolean insert(Long no, Long course_no, Float usual_score, Float end_score, String semester)
    {
        //æ ¹æ®è¯¾ç¨‹ç¼–å·æŸ¥è¯¢è¯¾ç¨‹ä¿¡æ¯
        data.Course courseInformation = Course.getCourseInformation(course_no);
        //åº”è¯¥è¦å­˜åœ¨æ­¤è¯¾ç¨‹æ‰èƒ½æ’å…¥
        //å¦‚æœä¸å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œç›´æ¥è¿”å›
        if (courseInformation == null)
        {
            return false;
        }
        //è¯¾ç¨‹å­˜åœ¨
        //è®¡ç®—æœ€ç»ˆæˆç»©
        Float final_score = getFinalScore(courseInformation.getCourse_mode(), usual_score, end_score);
        //è®¡ç®—ç»©ç‚¹
        Float gradePoint = getGradePoint(final_score);
        //sqlè¯­å¥
        String sql = "insert into score values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?)";
        //å‚æ•°
        Object[] objects = {no, course_no, usual_score, end_score, final_score, gradePoint, semester};
        //æ‰§è¡Œsql
        int result = JDBCTemplate.update(sql, objects);
        //è¿”å›ç»“æœ
        if (result > 0)
        {
            return true;
        }
        return false;
    }

    /**
     * ä¿®æ”¹æˆç»©ï¼Œåº”è¯¥åªèƒ½ç®¡ç†å‘˜èƒ½ä¿®æ”¹ï¼Œè€å¸ˆåªæœ‰æ’å…¥æƒ
     *
     * @param no          è¦ä¿®æ”¹æˆç»©çš„å­¦ç”Ÿå­¦å·
     * @param course_no   è¦ä¿®æ”¹æˆç»©çš„å­¦ç”Ÿè¯¾ç¨‹å·
     * @param usual_score å¹³æ—¶æˆç»©
     * @param end_score   æœŸæœ«æˆç»©
     * @param semester    å­¦æœŸ
     * @return æˆåŠŸï¼Œè¿”å›trueï¼Œå¤±è´¥è¿”å›false
     */
    public static boolean update(Long no, Long course_no, Float usual_score, Float end_score, String semester)
    {
        //æ ¹æ®è¯¾ç¨‹ç¼–å·æŸ¥è¯¢è¯¾ç¨‹ä¿¡æ¯
        data.Course courseInformation = Course.getCourseInformation(course_no);
        //åº”è¯¥è¦å­˜åœ¨æ­¤è¯¾ç¨‹æ‰èƒ½æ’å…¥
        //å¦‚æœä¸å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œç›´æ¥è¿”å›
        if (courseInformation == null)
        {
            return false;
        }
        //è¯¾ç¨‹å­˜åœ¨
        //è®¡ç®—æœ€ç»ˆæˆç»©
        Float final_score = getFinalScore(courseInformation.getCourse_mode(), usual_score, end_score);
        //è®¡ç®—ç»©ç‚¹
        Float gradePoint = getGradePoint(final_score);
        //sqlè¯­å¥
        String sql = "update score set usual_score=?,end_score=?,final_score=?,grade_point=?,semester=? where no=? and course_no=?";
        //å‚æ•°
        Object[] objects = {usual_score, end_score, final_score, gradePoint, semester, no, course_no};
        //æ‰§è¡Œsql
        int result = JDBCTemplate.update(sql, objects);
        //è¿”å›ç»“æœ
        if (result > 0)
        {
            return true;
        }
        return false;
    }

    /**
     * åˆ é™¤ä¸€æ¡æˆç»©(ä¸€åå­¦ç”Ÿçš„ä¸€åæˆç»©)
     *
     * @param no        å­¦ç”Ÿå­¦å·
     * @param course_no è¯¾ç¨‹ç¼–å·
     * @return æˆåŠŸï¼Œè¿”å›trueï¼Œå¤±è´¥è¿”å›false
     */
    public static boolean delete(Long no, Long course_no)
    {
        //sqlè¯­å¥
        String sql = "delete from score where no=? and course_no=?";
        //å‚æ•°
        Object[] objects = {no, course_no};
        //æ‰§è¡Œsql
        int result = JDBCTemplate.update(sql, objects);
        //åˆ¤æ–­è¿”å›å€¼
        if (result > 0)
        {
            return true;
        }
        return false;
    }

    /**
     * åˆ é™¤å­¦ç”Ÿçš„å…¨éƒ¨æˆç»©(ä¸€åå­¦ç”Ÿçš„æ‰€æœ‰æˆç»©) ï¼Œè°¨æ…ä½¿ç”¨ï¼
     *
     * @param no å­¦ç”Ÿå­¦å·
     * @return åˆ é™¤çš„æˆç»©æ¡æ•°
     */
    public static int deleteStudentAllScore(Long no)
    {
        //sqlè¯­å¥
        String sql = "delete from score where no=?";
        //å‚æ•°
        Object[] objects = {no};
        //æ‰§è¡Œsql
        int result = JDBCTemplate.update(sql, objects);
        //è¿”å›
        return result;
    }

    /**
     * åˆ é™¤ä¸€é—¨è¯¾ç¨‹çš„æ‰€æœ‰å­¦ç”Ÿçš„æˆç»©(æ‰€æœ‰å­¦ç”Ÿçš„æŸé—¨æˆç»©)ï¼Œè°¨æ…ä½¿ç”¨ï¼
     *
     * @param course_no è¯¾ç¨‹ç¼–å·
     * @return åˆ é™¤çš„æˆç»©æ¡æ•°
     */
    public static int deleteCourseAllScore(Long course_no)
    {
        //sqlè¯­å¥
        String sql = "delete from score where course_no=?";
        //å‚æ•°
        Object[] objects = {course_no};
        //æ‰§è¡Œsql
        int result = JDBCTemplate.update(sql, objects);
        //è¿”å›
        return result;
    }

    /**
     * è·å¾—æŸä¸ªå­¦ç”Ÿçš„æˆç»©ä¿¡æ¯ï¼ŒåŒ…å«è¯¾ç¨‹ä¿¡æ¯
     *
     * @param no å­¦ç”Ÿå­¦å·
     * @return äºŒç»´æ•°ç»„
     */
    public static Object[][] getStudentScoreArray(Long no)
    {
        //sqlè¯­å¥
        String sql = "SELECT course.*,score.usual_score,score.end_score,score.final_score,score.grade_point," +
                "score.semester FROM course,score WHERE course.course_no=score.course_no AND score.`no`=?" +
                " ORDER BY score.grade_point DESC";
        //å‚æ•°
        Object[] objects = {no};
        //æ‰§è¡Œsql
        Object[][] array = JDBCTemplate.queryForArray(sql, objects);
        //è¿”å›
        return array;
    }

    /**
     * éªŒè¯å­¦ç”Ÿçš„æˆç»©æ˜¯å¦å·²ç»å­˜åœ¨
     *
     * @param no        å­¦ç”Ÿå­¦å·
     * @param course_no è¯¾ç¨‹å·
     * @return å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œåˆ™è¿”å›trueï¼Œä¸å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œè¿”å›false
     */
    public static boolean verification(Long no, Long course_no)
    {
        //sqlè¯­å¥
        String sql = "select * from score where no=? and course_no=?";
        //å‚æ•°
        Object[] objects = {no, course_no};
        //æ‰§è¡Œsql
        data.Score score = JDBCTemplate.queryForObject(sql, new BeanHandler<>(data.Score.class), objects);
        if (score.getNo() == null)
        {
            //ä¸å­˜åœ¨
            return false;
        }
        else
        {
            //å­˜åœ¨
            return true;
        }
    }

    /**
     * è·å¾—æŸä¸€ä¸ªå­¦ç”Ÿçš„æŸä¸€ä¸ªç§‘ç›®çš„æˆç»©
     *
     * @param no        å­¦ç”Ÿå­¦å·
     * @param course_no è¯¾ç¨‹å·
     * @return data.Scoreå¯¹è±¡
     */
    public static data.Score getStudentScore(Long no, Long course_no)
    {
        //sqlè¯­å¥
        String sql = "select * from score where no=? and course_no=?";
        //å‚æ•°
        Object[] objects = {no, course_no};
        //æ‰§è¡Œsql
        data.Score score = JDBCTemplate.queryForObject(sql, new BeanHandler<>(data.Score.class), objects);
        //è¿”å›
        if (score.getNo() == null)
        {
            return null;
        }
        return score;
    }
}

     * æ’å…¥ä¸€æ¡å­¦ç”Ÿä¿¡æ¯
     *
     * @param no                      å­¦å·
     * @param name                    å­¦ç”Ÿå§“å
     * @param sex                     å­¦ç”Ÿæ€§åˆ«
     * @param telephone_number        ç”µè¯å·ç 
     * @param family_telephone_number å®¶åº­ç”µè¯å·ç ï¼Œæˆ–è€…ç´§æ€¥è”ç³»äºº
     * @param birthday                ç”Ÿæ—¥
     * @param address                 å®¶åº­åœ°å€
     * @param id_card                 èº«ä»½è¯å·
     * @param email                   ç”µå­é‚®ç®±
     * @param dormitory_number        å¯å®¤å·
     * @param class_no                æ‰€å±ç­çº§å·
     * @param state                   çŠ¶æ€ï¼Œåœ¨è¯»ã€æ¯•ä¸šæˆ–è€…é€€å­¦
     * @param remarks                 å¤‡æ³¨
     * @return æˆåŠŸï¼Œè¿”å›trueï¼Œå¤±è´¥è¿”å›false
     */
    public static boolean insert(Long no, String name, String sex, String telephone_number, String family_telephone_number,
                                 String birthday, String address, String id_card, String email, String dormitory_number,
                                 Long class_no, String state, String remarks)
    {
        //è·å¾—èº«ä»½è¯åå…­ä½,ä½œä¸ºåˆå§‹å¯†ç 
        String password = id_card.substring(id_card.length() - 6);
        //è·å¾—å¯†ç çš„æ•£åˆ—å€¼
        String password_MD5 = SHA.MD5.getMD5(password);
        //sqlè¯­å¥
        //æ’å…¥å­¦ç”Ÿä¿¡æ¯
        String sql1 = "insert into student values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)";
        //æ’å…¥å¯†ç 
        String sql2 = "insert into student_password values(?,?)";
        //å‚æ•°
        Object[] objects1 = {no, name, sex, telephone_number, family_telephone_number, birthday, address,
                id_card, email, dormitory_number, class_no, state, remarks};
        Object[] objects2 = {no, password_MD5};
        //åˆå¹¶
        String[] sql = {sql1, sql2};
        Object[][] objects = {objects1, objects2};
        //æ‰§è¡Œsql
        int result = JDBCTemplate.update(sql, objects);
        //åˆ¤æ–­è¿”å›å€¼
        if (result > 0)
        {
            return true;
        }
        return false;
    }

    /**
     * æ’å…¥ä¸€æ¡å­¦ç”Ÿä¿¡æ¯
     *
     * @param student data.Studentå¯¹è±¡
     * @return æˆåŠŸï¼Œè¿”å›trueï¼Œå¤±è´¥è¿”å›false
     */
    public static boolean insert(data.Student student)
    {
        //è·å¾—èº«ä»½è¯åå…­ä½,ä½œä¸ºåˆå§‹å¯†ç 
        String password = student.getId_card().substring(student.getId_card().length() - 6);
        //è·å¾—å¯†ç çš„æ•£åˆ—å€¼
        String password_MD5 = SHA.MD5.getMD5(password);
        //sqlè¯­å¥
        //æ’å…¥å¯†ç 
        String sql1 = "insert into student_password values(?,?)";
        //æ’å…¥å­¦ç”Ÿä¿¡æ¯
        String sql2 = "insert into student values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)";
        //å‚æ•°
        Object[] objects1 = {student.getStudent_no(), password_MD5};
        Object[] objects2 = {student.getStudent_no(), student.getName(), student.getSex(), student.getTelephone_number(),
                student.getFamily_telephone_number(), student.getBirthday(), student.getAddress(),
                student.getId_card(), student.getEmail(), student.getDormitory_number(), student.getClass_no(), student.getState(), student.getRemarks()};
        //åˆå¹¶
        String[] sql = {sql1, sql2};
        Object[][] objects = {objects1, objects2};
        //æ‰§è¡Œsql
        int result = JDBCTemplate.update(sql, objects);
        //åˆ¤æ–­è¿”å›å€¼
        if (result > 0)
        {
            return true;
        }
        return false;
    }

    /**
     * æ›´æ–°ä¸€æ¡å­¦ç”Ÿä¿¡æ¯ï¼Œä¸å¯æ›´æ–°å­¦å·ï¼Œå¦‚æœæƒ³æ›´æ–°å­¦å·ï¼Œåˆ é™¤äº†é‡æ–°æ’å…¥
     *
     * @param no                      è¦æ›´æ–°çš„å­¦ç”Ÿå­¦å·
     * @param name                    å­¦ç”Ÿå§“å
     * @param sex                     å­¦ç”Ÿæ€§åˆ«
     * @param telephone_number        ç”µè¯å·ç 
     * @param family_telephone_number å®¶åº­ç”µè¯å·ç ï¼Œæˆ–è€…ç´§æ€¥è”ç³»äºº
     * @param birthday                ç”Ÿæ—¥
     * @param address                 å®¶åº­åœ°å€
     * @param id_card                 èº«ä»½è¯å·
     * @param email                   ç”µå­é‚®ç®±
     * @param dormitory_number        å¯å®¤å·
     * @param class_no                æ‰€å±ç­çº§å·
     * @param state                   çŠ¶æ€ï¼Œåœ¨è¯»ã€æ¯•ä¸šæˆ–è€…é€€å­¦
     * @param remarks                 å¤‡æ³¨
     * @return æˆåŠŸï¼Œè¿”å›trueï¼Œå¤±è´¥è¿”å›false
     */
    public static boolean update(Long no, String name, String sex, String telephone_number, String family_telephone_number,
                                 String birthday, String address, String id_card, String email, String dormitory_number,
                                 Long class_no, String state, String remarks)
    {
        //sqlè¯­å¥
        String sql = "UPDATE student SET student.`name`= ?,student.sex=?,student.telephone_number=?," +
                "student.family_telephone_number=?,student.birthday=?,student.address=?,student.id_card=?," +
                "student.email=?,student.dormitory_number=?,student.class_no=?,student.state=?,student.remarks=?" +
                " WHERE student.`student_no`=?";
        //å‚æ•°
        Object[] objects = {name, sex, telephone_number, family_telephone_number, birthday, address,
                id_card, email, dormitory_number, class_no, state, remarks, no};
        //æ‰§è¡Œsql
        int result = JDBCTemplate.update(sql, objects);
        //åˆ¤æ–­è¿”å›å€¼
        if (result > 0)
        {
            return true;
        }
        return false;
    }

    /**
     * åˆ é™¤ä¸€æ¡å­¦ç”Ÿä¿¡æ¯ï¼Œåˆ é™¤ä¹‹å‰è¦ç¡®ä¿å·²åˆ é™¤å…¶å®ƒä¸æ­¤å­¦å·å…³è”çš„ä¿¡æ¯(å¤–é”®)ï¼Œä¸ç„¶å°†åˆ é™¤å¤±è´¥
     *
     * @param no å­¦ç”Ÿå­¦å·
     * @return æˆåŠŸï¼Œè¿”å›trueï¼Œå¤±è´¥è¿”å›false
     */
    public static boolean delete(Long no)
    {
        //åˆ é™¤å­¦ç”Ÿä¹‹å‰è¦åˆ é™¤å­¦ç”Ÿå¯¹åº”çš„å¯†ç 
        //sqlè¯­å¥
        String sql1 = "delete from student_password where no=?";
        String sql2 = "delete from student where student_no=?";
        //å‚æ•°
        Object[] objects1 = {no};
        Object[] objects2 = {no};
        //åˆå¹¶
        String[] sql = {sql1, sql2};
        Object[][] objects = {objects1, objects2};
        //æ‰§è¡Œsql
        int result = JDBCTemplate.update(sql, objects);
        //åˆ¤æ–­è¿”å›å€¼
        if (result > 0)
        {
            return true;
        }
        return false;
    }

    /**
     * è·å¾—ä¸€ä¸ªäºŒç»´æ•°ç»„ï¼ŒæŠŠclass_noå˜æˆclass_name
     *
     * @return è¿”å›ä¸€ä¸ªObjectç±»å‹çš„äºŒç»´æ•°ç»„ï¼Œæ³¨æ„ï¼šäºŒç»´æ•°ç»„çš„ç¬¬ä¸€è¡Œä¸ºåˆ—çš„åç§°
     */
    public static Object[][] getStudentArray()
    {
        //sqlè¯­å¥
        String sql = "SELECT student.student_no,student.name,student.sex,student.telephone_number," +
                "student.family_telephone_number,student.birthday,student.address,student.id_card," +
                "student.email,student.dormitory_number,class.class_name,student.state,student.remarks " +
                "FROM student,class WHERE student.class_no=class.class_no";
        //å‚æ•°ï¼Œæ— 
        Object[] objects = {};
        //æ‰§è¡Œsql
        Object[][] array = JDBCTemplate.queryForArray(sql, objects);
        return array;
    }

    /**
     * è·å¾—æŸä¸ªç­çº§çš„æ‰€æœ‰å­¦ç”Ÿï¼Œè·å¾—ä¸€ä¸ªäºŒç»´æ•°ç»„ï¼ŒæŠŠclass_noå˜æˆclass_name
     *
     * @param class_no ç­çº§ç¼–å·
     * @return è¿”å›ä¸€ä¸ªObjectç±»å‹çš„äºŒç»´æ•°ç»„ï¼Œæ³¨æ„ï¼šäºŒç»´æ•°ç»„çš„ç¬¬ä¸€è¡Œä¸ºåˆ—çš„åç§°
     */
    public static Object[][] getClassStudentArray(Long class_no)
    {
        //sqlè¯­å¥
        String sql = "SELECT student.student_no,student.name,student.sex,student.telephone_number," +
                "student.family_telephone_number,student.birthday,student.address,student.id_card," +
                "student.email,student.dormitory_number,class.class_name,student.state,student.remarks " +
                "FROM student,class WHERE student.class_no=class.class_no AND class.class_no=?";
        //å‚æ•°
        Object[] objects = {class_no};
        //æ‰§è¡Œsql
        Object[][] array = JDBCTemplate.queryForArray(sql, objects);
        return array;
    }

H:\³ÌĞò\´óÈıº®¼Ù\Êı¾İ¿â¿Î³ÌÉè¼Æ_»ùÓÚmysqlµÄÑ§ÉúĞÅÏ¢¹ÜÀíÏµÍ³javaWebÊµÏÖ\\src\\main\\java\\table\\StudentPassword.java
package table;

import tools.Handler.BeanHandler;
import tools.JDBCTemplate;

/**
 * Project name(é¡¹ç›®åç§°)ï¼šDatabase_course_design_Java_Web_Implementation_of_student_information_management_system_based_on_MySQL
 * Package(åŒ…å): table
 * Class(ç±»å): StudentPassword
 * Author(ä½œè€…ï¼‰: mao
 * Author QQï¼š1296193245
 * GitHubï¼šhttps://github.com/maomao124/
 * Date(åˆ›å»ºæ—¥æœŸ)ï¼š 2022/1/31
 * Time(åˆ›å»ºæ—¶é—´)ï¼š 23:13
 * Version(ç‰ˆæœ¬): 1.0
 * Description(æè¿°)ï¼š å­¦ç”Ÿå¯†ç è¡¨
 */

public class StudentPassword
{
    /**
     * ç§æœ‰åŒ–æ„é€ å‡½æ•°ï¼Œç›®çš„æ˜¯ä¸è®©åˆ›å»ºå¯¹è±¡
     */
    public StudentPassword()
    {
    }

    /**
     * å­¦ç”Ÿç™»å½•éªŒè¯
     *
     * @param no            å­¦ç”Ÿå­¦å·
     * @param LoginPassword ç™»å½•å¯†ç 
     * @return å¦‚æœå¯†ç æ­£ç¡®ï¼Œè¿”å›trueï¼Œå¯†ç é”™è¯¯ï¼Œè¿”å›false
     */
    public static boolean verification(Long no, String LoginPassword)
    {
        //è·å¾—æ­¤å¯†ç çš„æ•£åˆ—å€¼
        String loginPassword_MD5 = SHA.MD5.getMD5(LoginPassword);
        //sqlè¯­å¥
        String sql = "select * from student_password where no=? and password=?";
        //å‚æ•°
        Object[] objects = {no, loginPassword_MD5};
        //æ‰§è¡Œsql
        data.StudentPassword Password = JDBCTemplate.queryForObject(sql, new BeanHandler<>(data.StudentPassword.class), objects);
        //åˆ¤æ–­è¿”å›å€¼
        if (Password.getNo() == null)
        {
            //ä¸»é”®ä¸ºç©ºï¼Œå¯†ç é”™è¯¯æˆ–è€…è´¦å·ä¸å­˜åœ¨
            return false;
        }
        else
        {
            //ä¸»é”®ä¸ä¸ºç©º
            Password = null;
            return true;
        }
    }

    /**
     * æ›´æ”¹å­¦ç”Ÿå¯†ç ï¼ŒåŒ…å«æ—§å¯†ç éªŒè¯
     *
     * @param no          å­¦ç”Ÿå­¦å·
     * @param oldPassword æ—§å¯†ç 
     * @param newPassword æ–°å¯†ç 
     * @return å¦‚æœå¯†ç æ­£ç¡®ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”æ›´æ”¹æˆåŠŸï¼Œè¿”å›trueï¼Œå¯†ç é”™è¯¯ï¼Œæˆ–è€…æ›´æ”¹å¤±è´¥ï¼Œè¿”å›false
     */
    public static boolean changePassword(Long no, String oldPassword, String newPassword)
    {
        //æ—§å¯†ç éªŒè¯
        boolean verificationResult = verification(no, oldPassword);
        if (!verificationResult)
        {
            //éªŒè¯ç»“æœä¸ºfalseï¼Œæ—§å¯†ç ä¸æ­£ç¡®ï¼Œç›´æ¥è¿”å›false
            return false;
        }
        //éªŒè¯ç»“æœä¸ºtrueï¼Œæ—§å¯†ç æ­£ç¡®
        //è·å¾—æ–°å¯†ç çš„æ•£åˆ—å€¼
        String newPassword_MD5 = SHA.MD5.getMD5(newPassword);
        //sqlè¯­å¥
        String sql = "update student_password set password=? where no=?";
        //å‚æ•°
        Object[] objects = {newPassword_MD5, no};
        //æ‰§è¡Œsqlè¯­å¥
        int result = JDBCTemplate.update(sql, objects);
        //å¤„ç†ç»“æœ
        if (result > 0)
        {
            return true;
        }
        else
        {
            return false;
        }
    }
}
ÿ
H:\³ÌĞò\´óÈıº®¼Ù\Êı¾İ¿â¿Î³ÌÉè¼Æ_»ùÓÚmysqlµÄÑ§ÉúĞÅÏ¢¹ÜÀíÏµÍ³javaWebÊµÏÖ\\src\\main\\java\\table\\Teach.java
package table;

import tools.Handler.BeanHandler;
import tools.Handler.BeanListHandler;
import tools.Handler.ScalarHandler;
import tools.JDBCTemplate;

import java.util.List;

/**
 * Project name(é¡¹ç›®åç§°)ï¼šDatabase_course_design_Java_Web_Implementation_of_student_information_management_system_based_on_MySQL
 * Package(åŒ…å): table

     *
     * @param teach_no ç¼–å·

    {
        //sqlè¯­å¥

        //è¿”å›ç»“æœ
        if (teach.getTeach_no() == null)
        {
            return null;
        }
        return teach;
    }

    /**
     * è·å¾—æŸä¸ªè€å¸ˆçš„å·¥ä½œä¿¡æ¯åˆ—è¡¨ï¼ˆæ•™æˆçš„ç­çº§å’Œè¯¾ç¨‹ï¼‰

    /**
     * æ’å…¥ä¸€æ¡æ•™ä¹¦ä¿¡æ¯

     * @param teacher_no è€å¸ˆç¼–å·
     * @param class_no   ç­çº§ç¼–å·
     * @param course_no  è¯¾ç¨‹ç¼–å·

     * @return æˆåŠŸï¼Œè¿”å›trueï¼Œå¤±è´¥è¿”å›false

        //åˆ¤æ–­è¿”å›å€¼
        if (result > 0)
        {
            return true;
        }
        return false;
    }


    /**
     * åˆ é™¤ç¼–å·ä¸ºteach_noçš„æ•™ä¹¦ä¿¡æ¯

    public static boolean verification(Long teacher_no, Long class_no, Long course_no)

        //sqlè¯­å¥

        //åˆ¤æ–­è¿”å›å€¼
        if (teach.getTeach_no() == null)
        {
            return false;
        }
        else
        {
            return true;
        }
    }

package table;

import tools.Handler.BeanHandler;
import tools.Handler.BeanListHandler;
import tools.Handler.ScalarHandler;
import tools.JDBCTemplate;

import java.util.List;

/**
 * Project name(é¡¹ç›®åç§°)ï¼šDatabase_course_design_Java_Web_Implementation_of_student_information_management_system_based_on_MySQL
 * Package(åŒ…å): table
 * Class(ç±»å): Teacher
 * Author(ä½œè€…ï¼‰: mao
 * Author QQï¼š1296193245
 * GitHubï¼šhttps://github.com/maomao124/
 * Date(åˆ›å»ºæ—¥æœŸ)ï¼š 2022/1/31
 * Time(åˆ›å»ºæ—¶é—´)ï¼š 23:13
 * Version(ç‰ˆæœ¬): 1.0
 * Description(æè¿°)ï¼š è€å¸ˆ
 */

public class Teacher
{
    /**
     * ç§æœ‰åŒ–æ„é€ å‡½æ•°ï¼Œç›®çš„æ˜¯ä¸è®©åˆ›å»ºå¯¹è±¡
     */
    public Teacher()
    {
    }

    /**
     * è·å¾—è€å¸ˆåˆ—è¡¨
     *
     * @return List<data.Teacher>å¯¹è±¡
     */
    public static List<data.Teacher> getTeacherList()
    {
        //sqlè¯­å¥
        String sql = "select * from teacher";
        //å‚æ•°ï¼Œæ— 
        Object[] objects = {};
        //æ‰§è¡Œsql
        List<data.Teacher> list = JDBCTemplate.queryForList(sql, new BeanListHandler<>(data.Teacher.class));
        //è¿”å›ç»“æœ
        return list;
    }

    /**
     * è·å¾—æŸä¸ªè€å¸ˆçš„ä¿¡æ¯
     *
     * @param teacher_no è€å¸ˆç¼–å·
     * @return data.Teacherå¯¹è±¡
     */
    public static data.Teacher getTeacher(Long teacher_no)
    {
        //sqlè¯­å¥
        String sql = "SELECT * from teacher where teacher_no=?";
        //å‚æ•°
        Object[] objects = {teacher_no};
        //æ‰§è¡Œsql
        data.Teacher teacher = JDBCTemplate.queryForObject(sql, new BeanHandler<>(data.Teacher.class), objects);
        //åˆ¤æ–­è¿”å›å€¼
        if (teacher.getTeacher_no() == null)
        {
            return null;
        }
        return teacher;
    }

    /**
     * è·å¾—è€å¸ˆæ€»æ•°
     *
     * @return è€å¸ˆçš„æ€»æ•°é‡
     */
    public static Long getTeacherCount()
    {
        //sqlè¯­å¥
        String sql = "SELECT COUNT(teacher.`teacher_no`) FROM teacher";
        //å‚æ•°ï¼Œæ— 
        Object[] objects = {};
        //æ‰§è¡Œsql
        Long result = JDBCTemplate.queryForScalar(sql, new ScalarHandler<>(), objects);
        //è¿”å›ç»“æœ
        return result;
    }

    /**
     * æ’å…¥ä¸€æ¡è€å¸ˆä¿¡æ¯
     *
     * @param teacher_no               è€å¸ˆç¼–å·
     * @param teacher_name             è€å¸ˆå§“å
     * @param teacher_sex              è€å¸ˆæ€§åˆ«
     * @param teacher_telephone_number è€å¸ˆç”µè¯å·ç 
     * @param teacher_email            è€å¸ˆç”µå­é‚®ç®±
     * @param teacher_address          è€å¸ˆå®¶åº­åœ°å€
     * @param teacher_idcard           è€å¸ˆèº«ä»½è¯å·ç 
     * @return æˆåŠŸï¼Œè¿”å›trueï¼Œå¤±è´¥è¿”å›false
     */
    public static boolean insert(Long teacher_no, String teacher_name, String teacher_sex, String teacher_telephone_number,
                                 String teacher_email, String teacher_address, String teacher_idcard)
    {
        //è·å¾—èº«ä»½è¯åå…­ä½,ä½œä¸ºåˆå§‹å¯†ç 
        String password = teacher_idcard.substring(teacher_idcard.length() - 6);
        //è·å¾—å¯†ç çš„æ•£åˆ—å€¼
        String password_SHA256 = SHA.SHA256.getSHA256(password);
        //sqlè¯­å¥
        String sql1 = "insert into teacher values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?)";
        String sql2 = "insert into teacher_password values(?,?)";
        //å‚æ•°
        Object[] objects1 = {teacher_no, teacher_name, teacher_sex, teacher_telephone_number, teacher_email, teacher_address, teacher_idcard};
        Object[] objects2 = {teacher_no, password_SHA256};
        //åˆå¹¶
        String[] sql = {sql1, sql2};
        Object[][] objects = {objects1, objects2};
        //æ‰§è¡Œsql
        int result = JDBCTemplate.update(sql, objects);
        //åˆ¤æ–­è¿”å›å€¼
        if (result > 0)
        {
            return true;
        }
        return false;
    }

    /**
     * æ›´æ–°è€å¸ˆä¿¡æ¯
     *
     * @param teacher_no               è¦æ›´æ–°çš„è€å¸ˆç¼–å·
     * @param teacher_name             è€å¸ˆå§“å
     * @param teacher_sex              è€å¸ˆæ€§åˆ«
     * @param teacher_telephone_number è€å¸ˆç”µè¯å·ç 
     * @param teacher_email            è€å¸ˆç”µå­é‚®ç®±
     * @param teacher_address          è€å¸ˆå®¶åº­åœ°å€
     * @param teacher_idcard           è€å¸ˆèº«ä»½è¯å·ç ,èº«ä»½è¯å·ç è¾“é”™äº†å»ºè®®å…ˆåˆ é™¤å†æ’å…¥ï¼Œå› ä¸ºæ›´æ–°èº«ä»½è¯å·ç ï¼Œåˆå§‹å¯†ç ä¸ä¼šå˜
     * @return æˆåŠŸï¼Œè¿”å›trueï¼Œå¤±è´¥è¿”å›false
     */
    public static boolean update(Long teacher_no, String teacher_name, String teacher_sex, String teacher_telephone_number,
                                 String teacher_email, String teacher_address, String teacher_idcard)
    {
        //sqlè¯­å¥
        String sql = "UPDATE teacher SET teacher_name=?,teacher_sex=?,teacher_telephone_number=?,teacher_email=?," +
                "teacher_address=?,teacher_idcard=? WHERE teacher_no=?";
        //å‚æ•°
        Object[] objects = {teacher_name, teacher_sex, teacher_telephone_number, teacher_email, teacher_address, teacher_idcard, teacher_no};
        //æ‰§è¡Œsql
        int result = JDBCTemplate.update(sql, objects);
        //åˆ¤æ–­è¿”å›å€¼
        if (result > 0)
        {
            return true;
        }
        return false;
    }

    /**
     * åˆ é™¤è€å¸ˆä¿¡æ¯ï¼Œåˆ é™¤ä¹‹å‰è¦ç¡®ä¿åˆ é™¤æ‰ä¸æ­¤ä¿¡æ¯å…³è”çš„ä¿¡æ¯ï¼ˆteachï¼‰ï¼Œå¦åˆ™åˆ é™¤å¤±è´¥
     *
     * @param teacher_no è¦åˆ é™¤çš„è€å¸ˆç¼–å·
     * @return æˆåŠŸï¼Œè¿”å›trueï¼Œå¤±è´¥è¿”å›false
     */
    public static boolean delete(Long teacher_no)
    {
        //sqlè¯­å¥
        String sql1 = "delete from teacher_password where teacher_no=?";
        String sql2 = "delete from teacher where teacher_no=?";
        //å‚æ•°
        Object[] objects1 = {teacher_no};
        Object[] objects2 = {teacher_no};
        //åˆå¹¶
        String[] sql = {sql1, sql2};
        Object[][] objects = {objects1, objects2};
        //æ‰§è¡Œsql
        int result = JDBCTemplate.update(sql, objects);
        //åˆ¤æ–­è¿”å›å€¼
        if (result > 0)
        {
            return true;
        }
        return false;
    }
}

H:\³ÌĞò\´óÈıº®¼Ù\Êı¾İ¿â¿Î³ÌÉè¼Æ_»ùÓÚmysqlµÄÑ§ÉúĞÅÏ¢¹ÜÀíÏµÍ³javaWebÊµÏÖ\\src\\main\\java\\table\\TeacherPassword.java
package table;

import tools.Handler.BeanHandler;
import tools.JDBCTemplate;

/**
 * Project name(é¡¹ç›®åç§°)ï¼šDatabase_course_design_Java_Web_Implementation_of_student_information_management_system_based_on_MySQL
 * Package(åŒ…å): table
 * Class(ç±»å): TeacherPassword
 * Author(ä½œè€…ï¼‰: mao
 * Author QQï¼š1296193245
 * GitHubï¼šhttps://github.com/maomao124/
 * Date(åˆ›å»ºæ—¥æœŸ)ï¼š 2022/1/31
 * Time(åˆ›å»ºæ—¶é—´)ï¼š 23:14
 * Version(ç‰ˆæœ¬): 1.0
 * Description(æè¿°)ï¼š è€å¸ˆå¯†ç 
 */

public class TeacherPassword
{
    /**
     * è€å¸ˆç™»å½•éªŒè¯
     *
     * @param teacher_no    è€å¸ˆèŒå·¥å·æˆ–è€…ç¼–å·
     * @param LoginPassword è€å¸ˆç™»å½•å¯†ç 
     * @return å¦‚æœå¯†ç æ­£ç¡®ï¼Œè¿”å›trueï¼Œå¯†ç é”™è¯¯ï¼Œè¿”å›false
     */
    public static boolean verification(Long teacher_no, String LoginPassword)
    {
        //è·å¾—æ­¤å¯†ç çš„æ•£åˆ—å€¼
        String loginPassword_SHA256 = SHA.SHA256.getSHA256(LoginPassword);
        //sqlè¯­å¥
        String sql = "select * from teacher_password where teacher_no=? and teacher_password=?";
        //å‚æ•°
        Object[] objects = {teacher_no, loginPassword_SHA256};
        //æ‰§è¡Œsql
        data.TeacherPassword Password = JDBCTemplate.queryForObject(sql, new BeanHandler<>(data.TeacherPassword.class), objects);
        //åˆ¤æ–­è¿”å›å€¼
        if (Password.getTeacher_no() == null)
        {
            //ä¸»é”®ä¸ºç©ºï¼Œå¯†ç é”™è¯¯æˆ–è€…è´¦å·ä¸å­˜åœ¨
            return false;
        }
        else
        {
            //ä¸»é”®ä¸ä¸ºç©º
            Password = null;
            return true;
        }
    }

    /**
     * æ›´æ”¹è€å¸ˆç™»å½•å¯†ç ï¼ŒåŒ…å«æ—§å¯†ç éªŒè¯
     *
     * @param teacher_no  è€å¸ˆèŒå·¥å·
     * @param oldPassword æ—§å¯†ç 
     * @param newPassword æ–°å¯†ç 
     * @return å¦‚æœå¯†ç æ­£ç¡®ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”æ›´æ”¹æˆåŠŸï¼Œè¿”å›trueï¼Œå¯†ç é”™è¯¯ï¼Œæˆ–è€…æ›´æ”¹å¤±è´¥ï¼Œè¿”å›false
     */
    public static boolean changePassword(Long teacher_no, String oldPassword, String newPassword)
    {
        //æ—§å¯†ç éªŒè¯
        boolean verificationResult = verification(teacher_no, oldPassword);
        if (!verificationResult)
        {
            //éªŒè¯ç»“æœä¸ºfalseï¼Œæ—§å¯†ç ä¸æ­£ç¡®ï¼Œç›´æ¥è¿”å›false
            return false;
        }
        //éªŒè¯ç»“æœä¸ºtrueï¼Œæ—§å¯†ç æ­£ç¡®
        //è·å¾—æ–°å¯†ç çš„æ•£åˆ—å€¼
        String newPassword_SHA256 = SHA.SHA256.getSHA256(newPassword);
        //sqlè¯­å¥
        String sql = "update teacher_password set teacher_password=? where teacher_no=?";
        //å‚æ•°
        Object[] objects = {newPassword_SHA256, teacher_no};
        //æ‰§è¡Œsqlè¯­å¥
        int result = JDBCTemplate.update(sql, objects);
        //å¤„ç†ç»“æœ
        if (result > 0)
        {
            return true;
        }
        else
        {
            return false;
        }
    }
}

H:\³ÌĞò\´óÈıº®¼Ù\Êı¾İ¿â¿Î³ÌÉè¼Æ_»ùÓÚmysqlµÄÑ§ÉúĞÅÏ¢¹ÜÀíÏµÍ³javaWebÊµÏÖ\\src\\main\\java\\tools\\Druid.java
package tools;

import com.alibaba.druid.pool.DruidDataSourceFactory;

import javax.sql.DataSource;
import java.io.InputStream;
import java.sql.*;
import java.util.Properties;

/**
 * Project name(é¡¹ç›®åç§°)ï¼šDatabase_course_design_Java_Web_Implementation_of_student_information_management_system_based_on_MySQL
 * Package(åŒ…å): tools
 * Class(ç±»å): Druid
 * Author(ä½œè€…ï¼‰: mao
 * Author QQï¼š1296193245
 * GitHubï¼šhttps://github.com/maomao124/
 * Date(åˆ›å»ºæ—¥æœŸ)ï¼š 2022/1/31
 * Time(åˆ›å»ºæ—¶é—´)ï¼š 22:57
 * Version(ç‰ˆæœ¬): 1.0
 * Description(æè¿°)ï¼š Druidè¿æ¥æ± 
 */


public class Druid
{
    /*
    druid.propertiesæ–‡ä»¶ï¼š

    #å¯ä»¥ç¼ºçœï¼Œä¼šæ ¹æ®urlè‡ªåŠ¨è¯†åˆ«
    driverClassName=com.mysql.cj.jdbc.Driver
    url=jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/student1
    username=root
    password=20010713

    ##åˆå§‹è¿æ¥æ•°ï¼Œé»˜è®¤0
    initialSize=10
    #æœ€å¤§è¿æ¥æ•°ï¼Œé»˜è®¤8
    maxActive=30
    #æœ€å°é—²ç½®æ•°
    minIdle=10
    #è·å–è¿æ¥çš„æœ€å¤§ç­‰å¾…æ—¶é—´ï¼Œå•ä½æ¯«ç§’
    maxWait=3000
    #ç¼“å­˜PreparedStatementï¼Œé»˜è®¤false
    poolPreparedStatements=true
    #ç¼“å­˜PreparedStatementçš„æœ€å¤§æ•°é‡ï¼Œé»˜è®¤-1ï¼ˆä¸ç¼“å­˜ï¼‰ã€‚å¤§äº0æ—¶ä¼šè‡ªåŠ¨å¼€å¯ç¼“å­˜PreparedStatementï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥å¯ä»¥çœç•¥ä¸Šä¸€å¥è®¾ç½®
    maxOpenPreparedStatements=20


     */

    //æ•°æ®æºå˜é‡
    private static DataSource dataSource;

    static
    {
        try
        {
            //åŠ è½½é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶
            InputStream inputStream = Druid.class.getClassLoader().getResourceAsStream("druid.properties");
            Properties properties = new Properties();
            properties.load(inputStream);
            //è·å–æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥å¯¹è±¡
            dataSource = DruidDataSourceFactory.createDataSource(properties);
        }
        catch (Exception e)
        {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }

    /**
     * ç§æœ‰åŒ–æ„é€ å‡½æ•°ï¼Œä¸èƒ½åˆ›å»ºå¯¹è±¡
     */
    private Druid()
    {

    }

    /**
     * è·å¾—ä¸€ä¸ªè¿æ¥å¯¹è±¡ï¼Œä»Druidè¿æ¥æ± å†…
     *
     * @return Connectionå¯¹è±¡, å¦‚æœè·å–å¤±è´¥ï¼Œåˆ™è¿”å›null
     */
    public static Connection getConnection()
    {
        Connection connection = null;
        try
        {
            connection = dataSource.getConnection();
        }
        catch (SQLException e)
        {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
        return connection;
    }

    /**
     * è·å–æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥æ± å¯¹è±¡
     *
     * @return è¿”å›DataSourceå¯¹è±¡
     */
    public static DataSource getDataSource()
    {
        return dataSource;
    }


    //å…³é—­æ–¹æ³•

    /**
     * å…³é—­æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥  3ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡ï¼Œç”¨äºå…³é—­æŸ¥è¯¢çš„è¿æ¥ 123
     *
     * @param connection æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥å¯¹è±¡
     * @param statement  Statementå¯¹è±¡
     * @param resultSet  ç»“æœé›†å¯¹è±¡
     */
    public static void close(Connection connection, Statement statement, ResultSet resultSet)
    {
        if (resultSet != null)
        {
            try
            {
                resultSet.close();
            }
            catch (Exception e)
            {
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
        }
        if (statement != null)
        {
            try
            {
                statement.close();
            }
            catch (Exception e)
            {
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
        }
        if (connection != null)
        {
            try
            {
                connection.close();
            }
            catch (Exception e)
            {
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
        }
    }

    /**
     * å…³é—­æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥  3ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡ï¼Œç”¨äºå…³é—­æŸ¥è¯¢çš„è¿æ¥ 132
     *
     * @param connection æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥å¯¹è±¡
     * @param statement  Statementå¯¹è±¡
     * @param resultSet  ç»“æœé›†å¯¹è±¡
     */
    public static void close(Connection connection, ResultSet resultSet, Statement statement)
    {
        close(connection, statement, resultSet);
    }

    /**
     * å…³é—­æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥  3ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡ï¼Œç”¨äºå…³é—­æŸ¥è¯¢çš„è¿æ¥ 213

    /**
     * å…³é—­æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥  3ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡ï¼Œç”¨äºå…³é—­é¢„ç¼–è¯‘çš„æŸ¥è¯¢çš„è¿æ¥ 123
     *

     * @param preparedStatement PreparedStatementå¯¹è±¡
     * @param resultSet         ç»“æœé›†å¯¹è±¡
     */

    {
        if (resultSet != null)
        {
            try
            {
                resultSet.close();
            }
            catch (Exception e)
            {
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
        }
        if (preparedStatement != null)
        {
            try
            {
                preparedStatement.close();
            }
            catch (Exception e)
            {
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
        }
        if (connection != null)
        {
            try
            {
                connection.close();
            }
            catch (Exception e)
            {
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
        }
    }

    /**
     * å…³é—­æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥  3ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡ï¼Œç”¨äºå…³é—­é¢„ç¼–è¯‘çš„æŸ¥è¯¢çš„è¿æ¥ 132

        close(connection, statement);
    }

    /**
     * å…³é—­æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥  2ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡ï¼Œç”¨äºå…³é—­é¢„ç¼–è¯‘çš„æ›´æ–°çš„è¿æ¥ 12

            catch (Exception e)

        }

    /**
     * å…³é—­æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥  2ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡ï¼Œç”¨äºå…³é—­é¢„ç¼–è¯‘çš„æ›´æ–°çš„è¿æ¥ 21

     * @param preparedStatement PreparedStatementå¯¹è±¡

        close(connection, preparedStatement);
    }

    /**
     * å…³é—­è¿æ¥å¯¹è±¡

     * @param connection è¿æ¥å¯¹è±¡

        if (connection != null)

            try

            }
            catch (Exception e)
            {
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
        }
    }

     * @param preparedStatement é¢„ç¼–è¯‘æ‰§è¡Œè€…å¯¹è±¡

    {

            try
            {
                preparedStatement.close();
            }
            catch (Exception e)
            {
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
        }
    }

H:\³ÌĞò\´óÈıº®¼Ù\Êı¾İ¿â¿Î³ÌÉè¼Æ_»ùÓÚmysqlµÄÑ§ÉúĞÅÏ¢¹ÜÀíÏµÍ³javaWebÊµÏÖ\\src\\main\\java\\tools\\Handler\\BeanHandler.java
package tools.Handler;


import java.beans.PropertyDescriptor;
import java.lang.reflect.Method;
import java.sql.ResultSet;
import java.sql.ResultSetMetaData;

/**
 * Project name(é¡¹ç›®åç§°)ï¼šDatabase_course_design_Java_Web_Implementation_of_student_information_management_system_based_on_MySQL
 * Package(åŒ…å): tools.Handler
 * Class(ç±»å): BeanHandler
 * Author(ä½œè€…ï¼‰: mao
 * Author QQï¼š1296193245
 * GitHubï¼šhttps://github.com/maomao124/
 * Date(åˆ›å»ºæ—¥æœŸ)ï¼š 2022/1/31
 * Time(åˆ›å»ºæ—¶é—´)ï¼š 22:58
 * Version(ç‰ˆæœ¬): 1.0
 * Description(æè¿°)ï¼š å¤„ç†ä¸€æ¡è®°å½•çš„ç»“æœé›†
 */

/*
æ¥å£ï¼š
public interface ResultSetHandler<T>
{
    <T> T handler(ResultSet resultSet);
}
 */


public class BeanHandler<T> implements ResultSetHandler<T>
{

    //classå¯¹è±¡ç±»å‹çš„å˜é‡
    private final Class<T> beanClass;

    //æ„é€ æ–¹æ³•èµ‹å€¼
    public BeanHandler(Class<T> beanClass)
    {
        this.beanClass = beanClass;
    }

    /**
     * æ ¹æ®ç»“æœé›†å¯¹è±¡è¿”å›å¯¹åº”çš„å¯¹è±¡
     *
     * @param resultSet ç»“æœé›†å¯¹è±¡
     * @return å¯¹è±¡
     */
    @Override
    public T handler(ResultSet resultSet)
    {
        //å£°æ˜è‡ªå®šä¹‰ç±»å‹
        T bean = null;
        try
        {
            //ä¸ºè‡ªå®šä¹‰å¯¹è±¡è¿›è¡Œèµ‹å€¼
            bean = beanClass.getDeclaredConstructor().newInstance();
            //è·å–ç»“æœé›†çš„æ•°æ®
            if (resultSet.next())
            {
                //é€šè¿‡ç»“æœé›†çš„å¯¹è±¡è·å–ç»“æœæºä¿¡æ¯å¯¹è±¡
                ResultSetMetaData metaData = resultSet.getMetaData();
                //é€šè¿‡æºä¿¡æ¯å¯¹è±¡è·å–åˆ—æ•°
                int count = metaData.getColumnCount();
                //å¾ªç¯éå†åˆ—æ•°
                for (int i = 1; i <= count; i++)
                {
                    //è·å–åˆ—å
                    String columnName = metaData.getColumnName(i);
                    //é€šè¿‡åˆ—åè·å–æ•°æ®
                    Object object = resultSet.getObject(columnName);
                    //åˆ›å»ºå±æ€§æè¿°å™¨å¯¹è±¡,å¯¹å¯¹è±¡çš„setæ–¹æ³•è¿›è¡Œèµ‹å€¼
                    PropertyDescriptor propertyDescriptor = new PropertyDescriptor(columnName.toLowerCase(), beanClass);
                    //è·å–setæ–¹æ³•
                    Method writeMethod = propertyDescriptor.getWriteMethod();
                    //æ‰§è¡Œsetæ–¹æ³•,èµ‹å€¼
                    writeMethod.invoke(bean, object);
                }
            }
        }
        catch (Exception e)
        {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
        //è¿”å›å¯¹è±¡
        return bean;
    }
}

ÿ
H:\³ÌĞò\´óÈıº®¼Ù\Êı¾İ¿â¿Î³ÌÉè¼Æ_»ùÓÚmysqlµÄÑ§ÉúĞÅÏ¢¹ÜÀíÏµÍ³javaWebÊµÏÖ\\src\\main\\java\\tools\\Handler\\BeanListHandler.java
package tools.Handler;

import java.beans.PropertyDescriptor;
import java.lang.reflect.Method;
import java.sql.ResultSet;
import java.sql.ResultSetMetaData;
import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.List;

/**
 * Project name(é¡¹ç›®åç§°)ï¼šDatabase_course_design_Java_Web_Implementation_of_student_information_management_system_based_on_MySQL
 * Package(åŒ…å): tools.Handler
 * Class(ç±»å): BeanListHandler
 * Author(ä½œè€…ï¼‰: mao
 * Author QQï¼š1296193245
 * GitHubï¼šhttps://github.com/maomao124/
 * Date(åˆ›å»ºæ—¥æœŸ)ï¼š 2022/1/31
 * Time(åˆ›å»ºæ—¶é—´)ï¼š 23:04
 * Version(ç‰ˆæœ¬): 1.0
 * Description(æè¿°)ï¼š æ— 
 */

/*
æ¥å£ï¼š
public interface ResultSetHandler<T>
{
    <T> T handler(ResultSet resultSet);
}
 */

@SuppressWarnings("all")
public class BeanListHandler<T> implements ResultSetHandler<T>
{
    //classå¯¹è±¡ç±»å‹çš„å˜é‡
    private final Class<T> beanClass;

    //æ„é€ æ–¹æ³•èµ‹å€¼
    public BeanListHandler(Class<T> beanClass)
    {
        this.beanClass = beanClass;
    }

    /**
     * æ ¹æ®ç»“æœé›†å¯¹è±¡è¿”å›å¯¹åº”çš„å¯¹è±¡é›†åˆ
     *
     * @param resultSet ç»“æœé›†å¯¹è±¡
     * @return listé›†åˆ
     */
    @Override
    public List<T> handler(ResultSet resultSet)
    {
        //å£°æ˜é›†åˆç±»å‹
        List<T> list = new ArrayList<>();
        try
        {
            //è·å–ç»“æœé›†çš„æ•°æ®
            while (resultSet.next())
            {
                //ä¸ºè‡ªå®šä¹‰å¯¹è±¡è¿›è¡Œèµ‹å€¼
                T bean = beanClass.getDeclaredConstructor().newInstance();
                //é€šè¿‡ç»“æœé›†çš„å¯¹è±¡è·å–ç»“æœæºä¿¡æ¯å¯¹è±¡
                ResultSetMetaData metaData = resultSet.getMetaData();
                //é€šè¿‡æºä¿¡æ¯å¯¹è±¡è·å–åˆ—æ•°
                int count = metaData.getColumnCount();
                //å¾ªç¯éå†åˆ—æ•°
                for (int i = 1; i <= count; i++)
                {
                    //è·å–åˆ—å
                    String columnName = metaData.getColumnName(i);
                    //é€šè¿‡åˆ—åè·å–æ•°æ®
                    Object object = resultSet.getObject(columnName);
                    //åˆ›å»ºå±æ€§æè¿°å™¨å¯¹è±¡,å¯¹å¯¹è±¡çš„setæ–¹æ³•è¿›è¡Œèµ‹å€¼
                    PropertyDescriptor propertyDescriptor = new PropertyDescriptor(columnName.toLowerCase(), beanClass);
                    //è·å–setæ–¹æ³•
                    Method writeMethod = propertyDescriptor.getWriteMethod();
                    //æ‰§è¡Œsetæ–¹æ³•,èµ‹å€¼
                    writeMethod.invoke(bean, object);
                }
                //å°†å¯¹è±¡ä¿å­˜åˆ°é›†åˆä¸­
                list.add(bean);
            }
        }
        catch (Exception e)
        {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
        //è¿”å›å¯¹è±¡
        return list;
    }
}

package tools.Handler;

import java.sql.ResultSet;

/**
 * Project name(é¡¹ç›®åç§°)ï¼šDatabase_course_design_Java_Web_Implementation_of_student_information_management_system_based_on_MySQL
 * Package(åŒ…å): tools.Handler
 * Interface(æ¥å£å): ResultSetHandler

public interface ResultSetHandler<T>
{
    <T> T handler(ResultSet resultSet);
}
