H:\³ÌĞò\´óÈıº®¼Ù\Êı¾İ¿â¿Î³ÌÉè¼Æ_»ùÓÚmysqlµÄÑ§ÉúĞÅÏ¢¹ÜÀíÏµÍ³javaWebÊµÏÖ\\src\\main\\java\\tools\\Handler\\ScalarHandler.java
package tools.Handler;

import java.sql.ResultSet;
import java.sql.ResultSetMetaData;

/**
 * Project name(é¡¹ç›®åç§°)ï¼šDatabase_course_design_Java_Web_Implementation_of_student_information_management_system_based_on_MySQL
 * Package(åŒ…å): tools.Handler
 * Class(ç±»å): SclalerHandler
 * Author(ä½œè€…ï¼‰: mao
 * Author QQï¼š1296193245
 * GitHubï¼šhttps://github.com/maomao124/
 * Date(åˆ›å»ºæ—¥æœŸ)ï¼š 2022/1/31
 * Time(åˆ›å»ºæ—¶é—´)ï¼š 23:04
 * Version(ç‰ˆæœ¬): 1.0
 * Description(æè¿°)ï¼š æ— 
 */

/*
æ¥å£ï¼š
public interface ResultSetHandler<T>
{
    <T> T handler(ResultSet resultSet);
}
 */

@SuppressWarnings("all")
public class ScalarHandler<T> implements ResultSetHandler<T>
{

    //æ„é€ æ–¹æ³•
    public ScalarHandler()
    {

    }

    /**
     * æ ¹æ®ç»“æœé›†å¯¹è±¡è¿”å›å¯¹åº”çš„æ•°æ®
     *
     * @param resultSet ç»“æœé›†å¯¹è±¡
     * @return Longå‹çš„å˜é‡
     */
    @Override
    public Long handler(ResultSet resultSet)
    {
        //å®šä¹‰Longç±»å‹çš„å˜é‡
        Long value = null;
        try
        {
            //è·å–ç»“æœé›†çš„æ•°æ®
            if (resultSet.next())
            {
                //é€šè¿‡ç»“æœé›†çš„å¯¹è±¡è·å–ç»“æœæºä¿¡æ¯å¯¹è±¡
                ResultSetMetaData metaData = resultSet.getMetaData();
                //è·å–ç¬¬ä¸€åˆ—çš„åˆ—å
                String columnName = metaData.getColumnName(1);
                //é€šè¿‡åˆ—åè·å–æ•°æ®
                value = resultSet.getLong(columnName);
            }
        }
        catch (Exception e)
        {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
        //è¿”å›å¯¹è±¡
        return value;
    }
}

ÿ
H:\³ÌĞò\´óÈıº®¼Ù\Êı¾İ¿â¿Î³ÌÉè¼Æ_»ùÓÚmysqlµÄÑ§ÉúĞÅÏ¢¹ÜÀíÏµÍ³javaWebÊµÏÖ\\src\\main\\java\\tools\\JDBCTemplate.java
package tools;

import io.ErrorLog;
import tools.Handler.ResultSetHandler;

import java.io.PrintWriter;
import java.io.StringWriter;
import java.io.Writer;
import java.sql.*;
import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.HashMap;
import java.util.List;

/**
 * Project name(é¡¹ç›®åç§°)ï¼šDatabase_course_design_Java_Web_Implementation_of_student_information_management_system_based_on_MySQL
 * Package(åŒ…å): tools
 * Class(ç±»å): JDBCTemples
 * Author(ä½œè€…ï¼‰: mao
 * Author QQï¼š1296193245
 * GitHubï¼šhttps://github.com/maomao124/
 * Date(åˆ›å»ºæ—¥æœŸ)ï¼š 2022/1/31
 * Time(åˆ›å»ºæ—¶é—´)ï¼š 23:06
 * Version(ç‰ˆæœ¬): 1.0
 * Description(æè¿°)ï¼š æ— 
 */

public class JDBCTemplate
{
    /**
     * ç§æœ‰åŒ–æ„é€ å‡½æ•°ï¼Œä¸èƒ½åˆ›å»ºå¯¹è±¡
     */
    private JDBCTemplate()
    {

    }

    /**
     * JDBCæ¡†æ¶ updateæ–¹æ³•
     *
     * @param sql  sqlæ›´æ–°è¯­å¥,æ‰§è¡Œæ­¤PreparedStatementå¯¹è±¡ä¸­çš„SQLè¯­å¥ï¼Œè¯¥è¯­å¥å¿…é¡»æ˜¯SQLæ•°æ®æ“ä½œè¯­è¨€(DML)è¯­å¥ï¼Œ
     *             ä¾‹å¦‚INSERTã€UPDATEæˆ–DELETEï¼›æˆ–ä¸è¿”å›ä»»ä½•å†…å®¹çš„SQLè¯­å¥ï¼Œä¾‹å¦‚DDLè¯­å¥ã€‚
     * @param objs sqlä¸­çš„é—®å·å ä½ç¬¦ï¼Œæ•°é‡å’Œé¡ºåºä¸€å®šè¦ä¸€è‡´
     * @return å½±å“è¡Œæ•°
     */
    public static int update(String sql, Object... objs)
    {
        //å½±å“è¡Œæ•°,åˆå§‹å€¼ä¸º0
        int result = 0;
        //è¿æ¥å¯¹è±¡
        Connection connection = null;
        //é¢„ç¼–è¯‘æ‰§è¡Œè€…å¯¹è±¡
        PreparedStatement preparedStatement = null;
        try
        {
            //è·å–è¿æ¥å¯¹è±¡(Druidè¿æ¥æ± )
            connection = Druid.getConnection();
            //æˆ–è€…(è‡ªå®šä¹‰æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥æ± )ï¼š
            //connection = connectionPool.getConnection();
            //æˆ–è€…ç›´æ¥è·å–(è‡ªå®šä¹‰JDBCå·¥å…·ç±»)ï¼š
            //connection = JDBC.getConnection();

            //é¢„ç¼–è¯‘sqlï¼Œè¿”å›æ‰§è¡Œè€…å¯¹è±¡
            preparedStatement = connection.prepareStatement(sql);
            //è·å–å‚æ•°çš„æºä¿¡æ¯å¯¹è±¡
            ParameterMetaData parameterMetaData = preparedStatement.getParameterMetaData();
            //è·å–å‚æ•°ä¸ªæ•°
            int count = parameterMetaData.getParameterCount();
            //åˆ¤æ–­å‚æ•°æ˜¯å¦ä¸€è‡´ï¼Œå¦‚æœä¸ä¸€è‡´ï¼Œå¼‚å¸¸æŠ›å‡º
            if (objs.length != count)
            {
                throw new RuntimeException("updateæ–¹æ³•ä¸­å‚æ•°ä¸ªæ•°ä¸ä¸€è‡´!");
            }
            //ä¸ºé—®å·å ä½ç¬¦èµ‹å€¼
            for (int i = 0; i < count; i++)
            {
                preparedStatement.setObject(i + 1, objs[i]);
            }
            //æ‰§è¡Œsqlè¯­å¥
            result = preparedStatement.executeUpdate();
        }
        catch (Exception e)
        {
            e.printStackTrace();
            final Writer writer = new StringWriter();
            final PrintWriter printWriter = new PrintWriter(writer);
            e.printStackTrace(printWriter);
            String stackTraceStr = writer.toString();
            ErrorLog.write(stackTraceStr);
        }
        finally
        {
            //é‡Šæ”¾èµ„æº
            Druid.close(connection, preparedStatement);
            //æˆ–è€…ï¼š
            //JDBC.close(connection, preparedStatement);
        }
        //è¿”å›ç»“æœ
        return result;
    }


    /**
     * JDBCæ¡†æ¶ updateæ–¹æ³• ç”¨äºå¼€å¯äº‹åŠ¡å¤„ç†ï¼Œç§æœ‰
     *
     * @param connection å…³é—­è‡ªåŠ¨æäº¤çš„è¿æ¥å¯¹è±¡
     * @param sql        sqlæ›´æ–°è¯­å¥,æ‰§è¡Œæ­¤PreparedStatementå¯¹è±¡ä¸­çš„SQLè¯­å¥ï¼Œè¯¥è¯­å¥å¿…é¡»æ˜¯SQLæ•°æ®æ“ä½œè¯­è¨€(DML)è¯­å¥ï¼Œ
     *                   ä¾‹å¦‚INSERTã€UPDATEæˆ–DELETEï¼›æˆ–ä¸è¿”å›ä»»ä½•å†…å®¹çš„SQLè¯­å¥ï¼Œä¾‹å¦‚DDLè¯­å¥ã€‚
     * @param objs       sqlä¸­çš„é—®å·å ä½ç¬¦ï¼Œæ•°é‡å’Œé¡ºåºä¸€å®šè¦ä¸€è‡´
     * @return å½±å“è¡Œæ•°
     * @throws Exception æ‰€æœ‰å¼‚å¸¸æŠ›å‡º
     */
    private static int update(Connection connection, String sql, Object... objs) throws Exception
    {
        //å½±å“è¡Œæ•°,åˆå§‹å€¼ä¸º0
        int result = 0;
        //é¢„ç¼–è¯‘æ‰§è¡Œè€…å¯¹è±¡
        PreparedStatement preparedStatement = null;
        try
        {
            //é¢„ç¼–è¯‘sqlï¼Œè¿”å›æ‰§è¡Œè€…å¯¹è±¡
            preparedStatement = connection.prepareStatement(sql);
            //è·å–å‚æ•°çš„æºä¿¡æ¯å¯¹è±¡
            ParameterMetaData parameterMetaData = preparedStatement.getParameterMetaData();
            //è·å–å‚æ•°ä¸ªæ•°
            int count = parameterMetaData.getParameterCount();
            //åˆ¤æ–­å‚æ•°æ˜¯å¦ä¸€è‡´ï¼Œå¦‚æœä¸ä¸€è‡´ï¼Œå¼‚å¸¸æŠ›å‡º
            if (objs.length != count)
            {
                throw new Exception("updateæ–¹æ³•ä¸­å‚æ•°ä¸ªæ•°ä¸ä¸€è‡´!");
            }
            //ä¸ºé—®å·å ä½ç¬¦èµ‹å€¼
            for (int i = 0; i < count; i++)
            {
                preparedStatement.setObject(i + 1, objs[i]);
            }
            //æ‰§è¡Œsqlè¯­å¥
            result = preparedStatement.executeUpdate();
        }
        finally
        {
            //é‡Šæ”¾èµ„æº
            Druid.close(preparedStatement);
            //æˆ–è€…ï¼š
            //JDBC.close(preparedStatement);
        }
        //è¿”å›ç»“æœ
        return result;
    }


    /**
     * JDBCæ¡†æ¶ updateæ–¹æ³• ç”¨äºå¼€å¯äº‹åŠ¡å¤„ç†
     *
     * @param sql  é€šç”¨çš„sqlæ›´æ–°è¯­å¥
     * @param objs Object[]... objsï¼ŒäºŒç»´æ•°ç»„ï¼Œæ ¹æ®æ­¤äºŒç»´æ•°ç»„çš„è¡Œé•¿åº¦æ¥åˆ¤æ–­æ‰§è¡Œsqlæ›´æ–°è¯­å¥çš„æ¬¡æ•°
     *             æ³¨æ„ï¼šäºŒç»´æ•°ç»„çš„æ¯ä¸€åˆ—çš„é•¿åº¦å¿…é¡»è¦å’Œsqlè¯­å¥çš„é—®å·å ä½ç¬¦çš„æ•°é‡è¦ä¸€è‡´
     * @return å½±å“è¡Œæ•°ï¼Œå¦‚æœæˆåŠŸï¼Œåˆ™è¿”å›äºŒç»´æ•°ç»„è¡Œé•¿åº¦ï¼Œå¤±è´¥åˆ™è¿”å›0
     */
    public static int update(String sql, Object[]... objs)
    {
        int result1 = 0;
        //è¿æ¥å¯¹è±¡
        Connection connection = null;
        //è·å–è¿æ¥å¯¹è±¡(Druidè¿æ¥æ± )
        connection = Druid.getConnection();
        //æˆ–è€…(è‡ªå®šä¹‰æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥æ± )ï¼š
        //connection = connectionPool.getConnection();
        //æˆ–è€…ç›´æ¥è·å–(è‡ªå®šä¹‰JDBCå·¥å…·ç±»)ï¼š
        //connection = JDBC.getConnection();
        try
        {
            //å…³é—­è‡ªåŠ¨æäº¤
            connection.setAutoCommit(false);
            for (int i = 0; i < objs.length; i++)
            {
                //å•ç‹¬ä½¿ç”¨
                int result = update(connection, sql, objs[i]);
                if (result == 0)
                {
                    //å¤„ç†æŸä¸€æ¡æ•°æ®çš„æ—¶å€™å‡ºç°é—®é¢˜ï¼ŒæŠ›å‡º
                    throw new Exception("å¤„ç†ç¬¬" + (i + 1) + "æ¡sqlè¯­å¥æ—¶å¤±è´¥(å½±å“è¡Œæ•°ä¸º0)");
                }
            }
            //æäº¤äº‹åŠ¡
            connection.commit();
            result1 = objs.length;
        }
        catch (Exception e)
        {
            try
            {
                //å›æ»šäº‹åŠ¡
                System.out.println("å›æ»šäº‹åŠ¡");
                connection.rollback();
            }
            catch (SQLException ex)
            {
                System.out.println("å›æ»šå¤±è´¥ï¼");
                ex.printStackTrace();
            }
            e.printStackTrace();
            final Writer writer = new StringWriter();
            final PrintWriter printWriter = new PrintWriter(writer);
            e.printStackTrace(printWriter);
            String stackTraceStr = writer.toString();
            ErrorLog.write(stackTraceStr);
        }
        finally
        {
            try
            {
                //é‡æ–°è®¾ç½®æˆè‡ªåŠ¨æäº¤ï¼Œå› ä¸ºè¦å½’è¿˜è¿æ¥è€Œä¸æ˜¯å…³é—­è¿æ¥
                connection.setAutoCommit(true);
            }
            catch (SQLException e)
            {
                e.printStackTrace();
                final Writer writer = new StringWriter();
                final PrintWriter printWriter = new PrintWriter(writer);
                e.printStackTrace(printWriter);
                String stackTraceStr = writer.toString();
                ErrorLog.write(stackTraceStr);
            }
            //å½’è¿˜è¿æ¥
            Druid.close(connection);
        }
        return result1;
    }


    /**
     * JDBCæ¡†æ¶ updateæ–¹æ³• ç”¨äºå¼€å¯äº‹åŠ¡å¤„ç†
     *
     * @param sql  sqlè¯­å¥æ•°ç»„ï¼Œæ­¤æ•°ç»„çš„é•¿åº¦ä¸€å®šè¦å’Œobjså‚æ•°çš„è¡Œé•¿åº¦ä¸€å®šè¦ä¸€è‡´ï¼Œä¸ç„¶ä¼šå¤±è´¥
     * @param objs Object[]... objsï¼ŒäºŒç»´æ•°ç»„ï¼Œæ ¹æ®æ­¤äºŒç»´æ•°ç»„çš„è¡Œé•¿åº¦æ¥åˆ¤æ–­æ‰§è¡Œsqlæ›´æ–°è¯­å¥çš„æ¬¡æ•°
     *             æ³¨æ„ï¼šäºŒç»´æ•°ç»„çš„æ¯ä¸€åˆ—çš„é•¿åº¦å¿…é¡»è¦å’Œå¯¹åº”çš„sqlè¯­å¥çš„å¯¹åº”çš„é—®å·å ä½ç¬¦çš„æ•°é‡è¦ä¸€è‡´
     * @return å½±å“è¡Œæ•°ï¼Œå¦‚æœæˆåŠŸï¼Œåˆ™è¿”å›äºŒç»´æ•°ç»„è¡Œé•¿åº¦ï¼Œå¤±è´¥åˆ™è¿”å›0
     */
    public static int update(String[] sql, Object[]... objs)
    {
        int result1 = 0;
        //è¿æ¥å¯¹è±¡
        Connection connection = null;
        //è·å–è¿æ¥å¯¹è±¡(Druidè¿æ¥æ± )
        connection = Druid.getConnection();
        //æˆ–è€…(è‡ªå®šä¹‰æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥æ± )ï¼š
        //connection = connectionPool.getConnection();
        //æˆ–è€…ç›´æ¥è·å–(è‡ªå®šä¹‰JDBCå·¥å…·ç±»)ï¼š
        //connection = JDBC.getConnection();
        try
        {
            //åˆ¤æ–­sqlè¯­å¥æ•°ç»„çš„é•¿åº¦å’Œä¼ å…¥çš„äºŒç»´æ•°ç»„çš„è¡Œé•¿åº¦æ˜¯å¦ä¸€è‡´
            if (sql.length != objs.length)
            {
                throw new Exception("updateæ–¹æ³•ä¸­sqlæ•°ç»„å‚æ•°ä¸ªæ•°å’ŒobjsäºŒç»´æ•°ç»„çš„è¡Œé•¿åº¦ä¸ä¸€è‡´!");
            }
            //å…³é—­è‡ªåŠ¨æäº¤
            connection.setAutoCommit(false);
            for (int i = 0; i < objs.length; i++)
            {
                //å•ç‹¬ä½¿ç”¨
                int result = update(connection, sql[i], objs[i]);
                if (result == 0)
                {
                    //å¤„ç†æŸä¸€æ¡æ•°æ®çš„æ—¶å€™å‡ºç°é—®é¢˜ï¼ŒæŠ›å‡º
                    throw new Exception("å¤„ç†ç¬¬" + (i + 1) + "æ¡sqlè¯­å¥æ—¶å¤±è´¥(å½±å“è¡Œæ•°ä¸º0)");
                }
            }
            //æäº¤äº‹åŠ¡
            connection.commit();
            result1 = objs.length;
        }
        catch (Exception e)
        {
            try
            {
                //å›æ»šäº‹åŠ¡
                System.out.println("å›æ»šäº‹åŠ¡");
                connection.rollback();
            }
            catch (SQLException ex)
            {
                System.out.println("å›æ»šå¤±è´¥ï¼");
                ex.printStackTrace();
            }
            e.printStackTrace();
            final Writer writer = new StringWriter();
            final PrintWriter printWriter = new PrintWriter(writer);
            e.printStackTrace(printWriter);
            String stackTraceStr = writer.toString();
            ErrorLog.write(stackTraceStr);
        }
        finally
        {
            try
            {
                //é‡æ–°è®¾ç½®æˆè‡ªåŠ¨æäº¤ï¼Œå› ä¸ºè¦å½’è¿˜è¿æ¥è€Œä¸æ˜¯å…³é—­è¿æ¥
                connection.setAutoCommit(true);
            }
            catch (SQLException e)
            {
                e.printStackTrace();
                final Writer writer = new StringWriter();
                final PrintWriter printWriter = new PrintWriter(writer);
                e.printStackTrace(printWriter);
                String stackTraceStr = writer.toString();
                ErrorLog.write(stackTraceStr);
            }
            //å½’è¿˜è¿æ¥
            Druid.close(connection);
        }
        return result1;
    }


    /**
     * æŸ¥è¯¢æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œæ­¤æ–¹æ³•ç”¨äºå°†ä¸€æ¡è®°å½•å°è£…æˆä¸€ä¸ªè‡ªå®šä¹‰å¯¹è±¡å¹¶è¿”å›ï¼Œå¦‚æœresultSetHandlerä¸­å‚æ•°ä¼ äººçš„æ˜¯Student.class,
     * åˆ™è¿”å›çš„æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªStudentç±»çš„å¯¹è±¡
     *
     * @param sql              sqlæŸ¥è¯¢è¯­å¥ï¼Œå»ºè®®é€šè¿‡ä¸»é”®æŸ¥æ‰¾ï¼Œå¦‚æœæŸ¥è¯¢çš„sqlè¯­å¥æœ‰å¤šæ¡è®°å½•ï¼Œåˆ™è¿”å›ç¬¬ä¸€æ¡è®°å½•
     *                         sqlè¯­å¥å®ä¾‹ï¼šselect * from table where primaryKey=?
     * @param resultSetHandler ResultSetHandler<T>å¯¹è±¡ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨ï¼šnew BeanHandler<>(è‡ªå®šä¹‰å¯¹è±¡.class)
     * @param objs             sqlä¸­çš„é—®å·å ä½ç¬¦ï¼Œæ•°é‡å’Œé¡ºåºä¸€å®šè¦ä¸€è‡´
     * @param <T>              æ³›å‹ï¼Œè‡ªå®šä¹‰å¯¹è±¡
     * @return è¿”å›è‡ªå®šä¹‰å¯¹è±¡
     */
    public static <T> T queryForObject(String sql, ResultSetHandler<T> resultSetHandler, Object... objs)
    {
        //å®šä¹‰æ³›å‹å˜é‡
        T object = null;
        //è¿æ¥å¯¹è±¡
        Connection connection = null;
        //é¢„ç¼–è¯‘æ‰§è¡Œè€…å¯¹è±¡
        PreparedStatement preparedStatement = null;
        //ç»“æœé›†å¯¹è±¡
        ResultSet resultSet = null;
        try
        {
            //è·å–è¿æ¥å¯¹è±¡(Druidè¿æ¥æ± )
            connection = Druid.getConnection();
            //æˆ–è€…(è‡ªå®šä¹‰æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥æ± )ï¼š
            //connection = connectionPool.getConnection();
            //æˆ–è€…ç›´æ¥è·å–(è‡ªå®šä¹‰JDBCå·¥å…·ç±»)ï¼š
            //connection = JDBC.getConnection();

            //é¢„ç¼–è¯‘sqlï¼Œè¿”å›æ‰§è¡Œè€…å¯¹è±¡
            preparedStatement = connection.prepareStatement(sql);
            //è·å–å‚æ•°çš„æºä¿¡æ¯å¯¹è±¡
            ParameterMetaData parameterMetaData = preparedStatement.getParameterMetaData();
            //è·å–å‚æ•°ä¸ªæ•°
            int count = parameterMetaData.getParameterCount();
            //åˆ¤æ–­å‚æ•°æ˜¯å¦ä¸€è‡´ï¼Œå¦‚æœä¸ä¸€è‡´ï¼Œå¼‚å¸¸æŠ›å‡º
            if (objs.length != count)
            {
                throw new RuntimeException("queryForObjectæ–¹æ³•ä¸­å‚æ•°ä¸ªæ•°ä¸ä¸€è‡´!");
            }
            //ä¸ºé—®å·å ä½ç¬¦èµ‹å€¼
            for (int i = 0; i < count; i++)
            {
                preparedStatement.setObject(i + 1, objs[i]);
            }
            //æ‰§è¡Œsqlè¯­å¥,è¿”å›ç»“æœé›†
            resultSet = preparedStatement.executeQuery();
            //é€šè¿‡beanHandlerç±»ä¸­çš„handleræ–¹æ³•å¯¹ç»“æœé›†è¿›è¡Œå¤„ç†
            object = resultSetHandler.handler(resultSet);
        }
        catch (Exception e)
        {
            e.printStackTrace();
            final Writer writer = new StringWriter();
            final PrintWriter printWriter = new PrintWriter(writer);
            e.printStackTrace(printWriter);
            String stackTraceStr = writer.toString();
            ErrorLog.write(stackTraceStr);
        }
        finally
        {
            //é‡Šæ”¾èµ„æº
            Druid.close(connection, preparedStatement, resultSet);
            //æˆ–è€…ï¼š
            //JDBC.close(connection, preparedStatement);
        }
        //è¿”å›ç»“æœ
        return object;
    }


    /**
     * æŸ¥è¯¢æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œæ­¤æ–¹æ³•ç”¨äºå°†å¤šæ¡è®°å½•å°è£…æˆä¸€ä¸ªé›†åˆå¯¹è±¡å¹¶è¿”å›ï¼Œå¦‚æœresultSetHandlerä¸­å‚æ•°ä¼ äººçš„æ˜¯Student.class,
     * åˆ™è¿”å›çš„æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªè£…æœ‰Studentç±»çš„å¯¹è±¡çš„Listé›†åˆ
     *
     * @param sql              sqlæŸ¥è¯¢è¯­å¥ï¼Œsqlè¯­å¥å®ä¾‹ï¼šselect * from table
     * @param resultSetHandler ResultSetHandler<T>å¯¹è±¡ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨ï¼šnew BeanListHandler<>(è‡ªå®šä¹‰å¯¹è±¡.class)
     * @param objs             sqlä¸­çš„é—®å·å ä½ç¬¦ï¼Œæ•°é‡å’Œé¡ºåºä¸€å®šè¦ä¸€è‡´
     * @param <T>              æ³›å‹ï¼Œè‡ªå®šä¹‰å¯¹è±¡
     * @return Listé›†åˆ
     */
    public static <T> List<T> queryForList(String sql, ResultSetHandler<T> resultSetHandler, Object... objs)
    {
        //å®šä¹‰æ³›å‹é›†åˆ
        List<T> list = new ArrayList<>();
        //è¿æ¥å¯¹è±¡
        Connection connection = null;
        //é¢„ç¼–è¯‘æ‰§è¡Œè€…å¯¹è±¡
        PreparedStatement preparedStatement = null;
        //ç»“æœé›†å¯¹è±¡
        ResultSet resultSet = null;
        try
        {
            //è·å–è¿æ¥å¯¹è±¡(Druidè¿æ¥æ± )
            connection = Druid.getConnection();
            //æˆ–è€…(è‡ªå®šä¹‰æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥æ± )ï¼š
            //connection = connectionPool.getConnection();
            //æˆ–è€…ç›´æ¥è·å–(è‡ªå®šä¹‰JDBCå·¥å…·ç±»)ï¼š
            //connection = JDBC.getConnection();

            //é¢„ç¼–è¯‘sqlï¼Œè¿”å›æ‰§è¡Œè€…å¯¹è±¡
            preparedStatement = connection.prepareStatement(sql);
            //è·å–å‚æ•°çš„æºä¿¡æ¯å¯¹è±¡
            ParameterMetaData parameterMetaData = preparedStatement.getParameterMetaData();
            //è·å–å‚æ•°ä¸ªæ•°
            int count = parameterMetaData.getParameterCount();
            //åˆ¤æ–­å‚æ•°æ˜¯å¦ä¸€è‡´ï¼Œå¦‚æœä¸ä¸€è‡´ï¼Œå¼‚å¸¸æŠ›å‡º
            if (objs.length != count)
            {
                throw new RuntimeException("queryForListæ–¹æ³•ä¸­å‚æ•°ä¸ªæ•°ä¸ä¸€è‡´!");
            }
            //ä¸ºé—®å·å ä½ç¬¦èµ‹å€¼
            for (int i = 0; i < count; i++)
            {
                preparedStatement.setObject(i + 1, objs[i]);
            }
            //æ‰§è¡Œsqlè¯­å¥,è¿”å›ç»“æœé›†
            resultSet = preparedStatement.executeQuery();
            //é€šè¿‡BeanListHandlerç±»ä¸­çš„handleræ–¹æ³•å¯¹ç»“æœé›†è¿›è¡Œå¤„ç†
            list = resultSetHandler.handler(resultSet);
        }
        catch (Exception e)
        {
            e.printStackTrace();
            final Writer writer = new StringWriter();
            final PrintWriter printWriter = new PrintWriter(writer);
            e.printStackTrace(printWriter);
            String stackTraceStr = writer.toString();
            ErrorLog.write(stackTraceStr);
        }
        finally
        {
            //é‡Šæ”¾èµ„æº
            Druid.close(connection, preparedStatement, resultSet);
            //æˆ–è€…ï¼š
            //JDBC.close(connection, preparedStatement);
        }
        //è¿”å›ç»“æœ
        return list;
    }


    /**
     * æŸ¥è¯¢æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œç”¨äºå°†èšåˆå‡½æ•°çš„æŸ¥è¯¢ç»“æœè¿›è¡Œè¿”å›ï¼Œæ³¨æ„ï¼šç»“æœé›†ä¸­åº”è¯¥è¦åªæœ‰ä¸€è¡Œå’Œä¸€åˆ—æ•°æ®(ä¸€ä¸ªæ•°æ®),
     * å¦‚æœæœ‰å¤šè¡Œæˆ–è€…å¤šåˆ—çš„æ•°æ®ï¼Œå°†å§‹ç»ˆè¿”å›ç¬¬ä¸€è¡Œç¬¬ä¸€åˆ—çš„æ•°æ®ï¼Œå¦‚æœç¬¬ä¸€è¡Œç¬¬ä¸€åˆ—çš„æ•°æ®ä¸èƒ½è½¬æ¢ä¸ºLongå‹ï¼Œåˆ™è¿”å›null
     *
     * @param sql              é¢„ç¼–è¯‘çš„sqlæŸ¥è¯¢è¯­å¥ï¼Œsqlè¯­å¥å®ä¾‹ï¼šselect count(primaryKey) from table
     * @param resultSetHandler ResultSetHandler<T>å¯¹è±¡ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨ï¼šnew ScalarHandler<>(è‡ªå®šä¹‰å¯¹è±¡.class)
     * @param objs             sqlä¸­çš„é—®å·å ä½ç¬¦ï¼Œæ•°é‡å’Œé¡ºåºä¸€å®šè¦ä¸€è‡´
     * @return Longå‹çš„å¯¹è±¡
     */
    public static Long queryForScalar(String sql, ResultSetHandler<Long> resultSetHandler, Object... objs)
    {
        //å®šä¹‰Longç±»å‹çš„å˜é‡
        Long value = null;
        //è¿æ¥å¯¹è±¡
        Connection connection = null;
        //é¢„ç¼–è¯‘æ‰§è¡Œè€…å¯¹è±¡
        PreparedStatement preparedStatement = null;
        //ç»“æœé›†å¯¹è±¡
        ResultSet resultSet = null;
        try
        {
            //è·å–è¿æ¥å¯¹è±¡(Druidè¿æ¥æ± )
            connection = Druid.getConnection();
            //æˆ–è€…(è‡ªå®šä¹‰æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥æ± )ï¼š
            //connection = connectionPool.getConnection();
            //æˆ–è€…ç›´æ¥è·å–(è‡ªå®šä¹‰JDBCå·¥å…·ç±»)ï¼š
            //connection = JDBC.getConnection();

            //é¢„ç¼–è¯‘sqlï¼Œè¿”å›æ‰§è¡Œè€…å¯¹è±¡
            preparedStatement = connection.prepareStatement(sql);
            //è·å–å‚æ•°çš„æºä¿¡æ¯å¯¹è±¡
            ParameterMetaData parameterMetaData = preparedStatement.getParameterMetaData();
            //è·å–å‚æ•°ä¸ªæ•°
            int count = parameterMetaData.getParameterCount();
            //åˆ¤æ–­å‚æ•°æ˜¯å¦ä¸€è‡´ï¼Œå¦‚æœä¸ä¸€è‡´ï¼Œå¼‚å¸¸æŠ›å‡º
            if (objs.length != count)
            {
                throw new RuntimeException("queryForScalaræ–¹æ³•ä¸­å‚æ•°ä¸ªæ•°ä¸ä¸€è‡´!");
            }
            //ä¸ºé—®å·å ä½ç¬¦èµ‹å€¼
            for (int i = 0; i < count; i++)
            {
                preparedStatement.setObject(i + 1, objs[i]);
            }
            //æ‰§è¡Œsqlè¯­å¥,è¿”å›ç»“æœé›†
            resultSet = preparedStatement.executeQuery();
            //é€šè¿‡ScalarHandlerç±»ä¸­çš„handleræ–¹æ³•å¯¹ç»“æœé›†è¿›è¡Œå¤„ç†
            value = resultSetHandler.handler(resultSet);
        }
        catch (Exception e)
        {
            e.printStackTrace();
            final Writer writer = new StringWriter();
            final PrintWriter printWriter = new PrintWriter(writer);
            e.printStackTrace(printWriter);
            String stackTraceStr = writer.toString();
            ErrorLog.write(stackTraceStr);
        }
        finally
        {
            //é‡Šæ”¾èµ„æº
            Druid.close(connection, preparedStatement, resultSet);
            //æˆ–è€…ï¼š
            //JDBC.close(connection, preparedStatement);
        }
        //è¿”å›ç»“æœ
        return value;
    }


    /**
     * æŸ¥è¯¢æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œæ­¤æ–¹æ³•ç”¨äºå°†ä¸€æ¡æˆ–è€…å¤šæ¡è®°å½•å°è£…æˆä¸€ä¸ªObjectçš„äºŒç»´æ•°ç»„å¹¶è¿”å›ï¼Œé€‚ç”¨äºå¤šè¡¨æŸ¥è¯¢
     *
     * @param sql  é¢„ç¼–è¯‘çš„sqlæŸ¥è¯¢è¯­å¥ï¼Œç»å¸¸ä½¿ç”¨å¤šè¡¨æŸ¥è¯¢ï¼Œsqlè¯­å¥å®ä¾‹ï¼šæŸ¥è¯¢æŸå·å­¦ç”Ÿé€‰ä¿®çš„è¯¾ç¨‹åç§°å’Œå¯¹åº”è¯¾ç¨‹çš„åˆ†æ•°ï¼š
     *             SELECT course.`name`, grade.grade
     *             FROM grade, course WHERE grade.cno = course.cno AND grade.`no`=?
     * @param objs sqlä¸­çš„é—®å·å ä½ç¬¦ï¼Œæ•°é‡å’Œé¡ºåºä¸€å®šè¦ä¸€è‡´ï¼Œåœ¨ä¸Šä¸€ä¸ªä¾‹å­ä¸­ï¼Œé—®å·çš„æ•°é‡ä¸º1ï¼Œæ•°ç»„ä¸ªæ•°ä¸ºä¸€ä¸ªã€‚
     *             ä¾‹å¦‚ï¼ŒæŸ¥è¯¢2å·å­¦ç”Ÿçš„å­¦ç”Ÿé€‰ä¿®çš„è¯¾ç¨‹åç§°å’Œå¯¹åº”è¯¾ç¨‹çš„åˆ†æ•°ï¼šå¯å˜æ•°ç»„çš„å€¼ä¸ºä¸€ä¸ªï¼Œå€¼ä¸º2ï¼Œ
     * @return è¿”å›ä¸€ä¸ªObjectç±»å‹çš„äºŒç»´æ•°ç»„ï¼Œæ³¨æ„ï¼šäºŒç»´æ•°ç»„çš„ç¬¬ä¸€è¡Œä¸ºåˆ—çš„åç§°ï¼Œåœ¨ä¸Šä¸€ä¸ªä¾‹å­ä¸­ï¼Œ
     * åˆ—åæœ‰ä¸¤ä¸ªåˆ™Object[0][0]ç­‰äºcourse.`name`çš„åˆ—åï¼ŒObject[0][1]ç­‰äºgrade.gradeçš„åˆ—åï¼Œ
     * çœŸæ­£çš„æ•°æ®ä»è¡Œä¸‹æ ‡ä¸º1å¼€å§‹ã€‚è¡¨å†…å®¹çš„è¡Œæ•°ä¸ºObject[][]å¯¹è±¡.length-1ã€‚
     */
    public static Object[][] queryForArray(String sql, Object... objs)
    {
        //å®šä¹‰ä¸€ä¸ªObjectç±»å‹çš„äºŒç»´æ•°ç»„
        Object[][] result = null;
        //è¿æ¥å¯¹è±¡
        Connection connection = null;
        //é¢„ç¼–è¯‘æ‰§è¡Œè€…å¯¹è±¡
        PreparedStatement preparedStatement = null;
        //ç»“æœé›†å¯¹è±¡
        ResultSet resultSet = null;
        try
        {
            //è·å–è¿æ¥å¯¹è±¡(Druidè¿æ¥æ± )
            connection = Druid.getConnection();
            //æˆ–è€…(è‡ªå®šä¹‰æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥æ± )ï¼š
            //connection = connectionPool.getConnection();
            //æˆ–è€…ç›´æ¥è·å–(è‡ªå®šä¹‰JDBCå·¥å…·ç±»)ï¼š
            //connection = JDBC.getConnection();

            //é¢„ç¼–è¯‘sqlï¼Œè¿”å›æ‰§è¡Œè€…å¯¹è±¡
            preparedStatement = connection.prepareStatement(sql, ResultSet.TYPE_SCROLL_SENSITIVE, ResultSet.CONCUR_UPDATABLE);
            //è·å–å‚æ•°çš„æºä¿¡æ¯å¯¹è±¡
            ParameterMetaData parameterMetaData = preparedStatement.getParameterMetaData();
            //è·å–å‚æ•°ä¸ªæ•°
            int count = parameterMetaData.getParameterCount();
            //åˆ¤æ–­å‚æ•°æ˜¯å¦ä¸€è‡´ï¼Œå¦‚æœä¸ä¸€è‡´ï¼Œå¼‚å¸¸æŠ›å‡º
            if (objs.length != count)
            {
                throw new RuntimeException("queryForArrayæ–¹æ³•ä¸­å‚æ•°ä¸ªæ•°ä¸ä¸€è‡´!");
            }
            //ä¸ºé—®å·å ä½ç¬¦èµ‹å€¼
            for (int i = 0; i < count; i++)
            {
                preparedStatement.setObject(i + 1, objs[i]);
            }
            //æ‰§è¡Œsqlè¯­å¥,è¿”å›ç»“æœé›†
            resultSet = preparedStatement.executeQuery();
            //å®šä¹‰è¡Œæ•°å’Œåˆ—æ•°
            int rows;
            int column;
            //é€šè¿‡ç»“æœé›†çš„å¯¹è±¡è·å–ç»“æœæºä¿¡æ¯å¯¹è±¡
            ResultSetMetaData metaData = resultSet.getMetaData();
            //é€šè¿‡æºä¿¡æ¯å¯¹è±¡è·å–åˆ—æ•°
            column = metaData.getColumnCount();
            //è·å–è¡Œæ•°
            //resultSet.afterLast();
            resultSet.last();
            rows = resultSet.getRow();
            //System.out.println(rows + "  " + column);
            //ç»“æœé›†å…‰æ ‡ç§»å›ç¬¬ä¸€è¡Œçš„å‰é¢
            resultSet.beforeFirst();
            //æ•°ç»„åˆ›å»ºï¼Œå› ä¸ºç¬¬ä¸€è¡Œä¸ºåˆ—çš„åç§°ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥è¡Œæ•°è¦åŠ ä¸€
            result = new Object[rows + 1][column];
            //å–å¾—åˆ—åç§°ï¼Œå¡«å……æ•°ç»„çš„ç¬¬ä¸€è¡Œ
            for (int i = 0; i < column; i++)
            {
                //è·å–åˆ—å
                String columnName = metaData.getColumnName(i + 1);
                result[0][i] = columnName;
            }
            int rowIndex = 1;
            //å¡«å……å…¶å®ƒæ•°æ®
            while (resultSet.next())
            {
                //å¾ªç¯éå†åˆ—æ•°
                for (int i = 0; i < column; i++)
                {
                    //è·å–åˆ—å
                    String columnName = metaData.getColumnName(i + 1);
                    //é€šè¿‡åˆ—åè·å–æ•°æ®
                    Object object = resultSet.getObject(columnName);
                    //System.err.print(object+" ");
                    //å¡«å……è‡³æ•°ç»„
                    result[rowIndex][i] = object;
                    //æˆ–è€…
                    //result[resultSet.getRow()][i] = object;
                }
                //è¡Œç´¢å¼•+1
                rowIndex = rowIndex + 1;
            }
        }
        catch (Exception e)
        {
            e.printStackTrace();
            final Writer writer = new StringWriter();
            final PrintWriter printWriter = new PrintWriter(writer);
            e.printStackTrace(printWriter);
            String stackTraceStr = writer.toString();
            ErrorLog.write(stackTraceStr);
        }
        finally
        {
            //é‡Šæ”¾èµ„æº
            Druid.close(connection, preparedStatement, resultSet);
            //æˆ–è€…ï¼š
            //JDBC.close(connection, preparedStatement);
        }
        //è¿”å›ç»“æœ
        return result;
    }


    /**
     * æŸ¥è¯¢æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œæ­¤æ–¹æ³•ç”¨äºå°†ä¸€æ¡æˆ–è€…å¤šæ¡è®°å½•å°è£…æˆä¸€ä¸ªlisté›†åˆå¹¶è¿”å›ï¼Œé€‚ç”¨äºå¤šè¡¨æŸ¥è¯¢
     * æ­¤æ–¹æ³•ä¸æ¨èä½¿ç”¨ï¼Œå› ä¸ºåœ¨mapé›†åˆä¸­ï¼Œkeyæ˜¯åˆ—åï¼Œé‡å¤ã€‚ä½†æ˜¯é›†åˆé‡å†™äº†toStringæ–¹æ³•ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ç›´æ¥è¾“å‡ºå­—ç¬¦ä¸²ã€‚
     *
     * @param sql  é¢„ç¼–è¯‘çš„sqlæŸ¥è¯¢è¯­å¥ï¼Œç»å¸¸ä½¿ç”¨å¤šè¡¨æŸ¥è¯¢ï¼Œsqlè¯­å¥å®ä¾‹ï¼šæŸ¥è¯¢æŸå·å­¦ç”Ÿé€‰ä¿®çš„è¯¾ç¨‹åç§°å’Œå¯¹åº”è¯¾ç¨‹çš„åˆ†æ•°ï¼š
     *             SELECT course.`name`, grade.grade
     *             FROM grade, course WHERE grade.cno = course.cno AND grade.`no`=?
     * @param objs sqlä¸­çš„é—®å·å ä½ç¬¦ï¼Œæ•°é‡å’Œé¡ºåºä¸€å®šè¦ä¸€è‡´ï¼Œåœ¨ä¸Šä¸€ä¸ªä¾‹å­ä¸­ï¼Œé—®å·çš„æ•°é‡ä¸º1ï¼Œæ•°ç»„ä¸ªæ•°ä¸ºä¸€ä¸ªã€‚
     *             ä¾‹å¦‚ï¼ŒæŸ¥è¯¢2å·å­¦ç”Ÿçš„å­¦ç”Ÿé€‰ä¿®çš„è¯¾ç¨‹åç§°å’Œå¯¹åº”è¯¾ç¨‹çš„åˆ†æ•°ï¼šå¯å˜æ•°ç»„çš„å€¼ä¸ºä¸€ä¸ªï¼Œå€¼ä¸º2ï¼Œ
     * @return è¿”å›ä¸€ä¸ªArrayListé›†åˆï¼Œlisté›†åˆçš„æ³›å‹ä¸ºHashMapé›†åˆï¼Œmapé›†åˆä¸­çš„é”®ä¸ºåˆ—åï¼Œå€¼ä¸ºæ­¤è¡Œçš„åˆ—åå¯¹åº”çš„å€¼
     * æ­¤æ–¹æ³•ä¸æ¨èä½¿ç”¨ï¼Œå› ä¸ºåœ¨mapé›†åˆä¸­ï¼Œkeyæ˜¯åˆ—åï¼Œé‡å¤ã€‚
     */
    public static List<HashMap<String, Object>> queryForListMap(String sql, Object... objs)
    {
        //å®šä¹‰ä¸€ä¸ªListé›†åˆ
        List<HashMap<String, Object>> list = new ArrayList<>();
        //è¿æ¥å¯¹è±¡
        Connection connection = null;
        //é¢„ç¼–è¯‘æ‰§è¡Œè€…å¯¹è±¡
        PreparedStatement preparedStatement = null;
        //ç»“æœé›†å¯¹è±¡
        ResultSet resultSet = null;
        try
        {
            //è·å–è¿æ¥å¯¹è±¡(Druidè¿æ¥æ± )
            connection = Druid.getConnection();
            //æˆ–è€…(è‡ªå®šä¹‰æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥æ± )ï¼š
            //connection = connectionPool.getConnection();
            //æˆ–è€…ç›´æ¥è·å–(è‡ªå®šä¹‰JDBCå·¥å…·ç±»)ï¼š
            //connection = JDBC.getConnection();

            //é¢„ç¼–è¯‘sqlï¼Œè¿”å›æ‰§è¡Œè€…å¯¹è±¡
            preparedStatement = connection.prepareStatement(sql, ResultSet.TYPE_SCROLL_SENSITIVE, ResultSet.CONCUR_UPDATABLE);
            //è·å–å‚æ•°çš„æºä¿¡æ¯å¯¹è±¡
            ParameterMetaData parameterMetaData = preparedStatement.getParameterMetaData();
            //è·å–å‚æ•°ä¸ªæ•°
            int count = parameterMetaData.getParameterCount();
            //åˆ¤æ–­å‚æ•°æ˜¯å¦ä¸€è‡´ï¼Œå¦‚æœä¸ä¸€è‡´ï¼Œå¼‚å¸¸æŠ›å‡º
            if (objs.length != count)
            {
                throw new RuntimeException("queryForArrayæ–¹æ³•ä¸­å‚æ•°ä¸ªæ•°ä¸ä¸€è‡´!");
            }
            //ä¸ºé—®å·å ä½ç¬¦èµ‹å€¼
            for (int i = 0; i < count; i++)
            {
                preparedStatement.setObject(i + 1, objs[i]);
            }
            //æ‰§è¡Œsqlè¯­å¥,è¿”å›ç»“æœé›†
            resultSet = preparedStatement.executeQuery();
            //é€šè¿‡ç»“æœé›†çš„å¯¹è±¡è·å–ç»“æœæºä¿¡æ¯å¯¹è±¡
            ResultSetMetaData metaData = resultSet.getMetaData();
            //é€šè¿‡æºä¿¡æ¯å¯¹è±¡è·å–åˆ—æ•°
            int column = metaData.getColumnCount();
            //å®šä¹‰HashMapé›†åˆå¯¹è±¡
            HashMap<String, Object> map = null;
            //å¡«å……æ•°æ®
            while (resultSet.next())
            {
                //å¼€è¾Ÿå¯¹è±¡
                map = new HashMap<>();
                //å¾ªç¯éå†åˆ—æ•°
                for (int i = 0; i < column; i++)
                {
                    //è·å–åˆ—å
                    String columnName = metaData.getColumnName(i + 1);
                    //é€šè¿‡åˆ—åè·å–æ•°æ®
                    Object object = resultSet.getObject(columnName);
                    //System.err.print(object+" ");
                    //é”®å€¼å¯¹åŠ å…¥åˆ°mapé›†åˆä¸­
                    map.put(columnName, object);
                }
                //åŠ å…¥åˆ°listé›†åˆä¸­
                list.add(map);
            }
        }
        catch (Exception e)
        {
            e.printStackTrace();
            final Writer writer = new StringWriter();
            final PrintWriter printWriter = new PrintWriter(writer);
            e.printStackTrace(printWriter);
            String stackTraceStr = writer.toString();
            ErrorLog.write(stackTraceStr);
        }
        finally
        {
            //é‡Šæ”¾èµ„æº
            Druid.close(connection, preparedStatement, resultSet);
            //æˆ–è€…ï¼š
            //JDBC.close(connection, preparedStatement);
        }
        //è¿”å›ç»“æœ
        return list;
    }
}


ÿ
H:\³ÌĞò\´óÈıº®¼Ù\Êı¾İ¿â¿Î³ÌÉè¼Æ_»ùÓÚmysqlµÄÑ§ÉúĞÅÏ¢¹ÜÀíÏµÍ³javaWebÊµÏÖ\\src\\main\\java\\tools\\test\\C3P0.java
package tools.test;

import com.mchange.v2.c3p0.ComboPooledDataSource;

import java.sql.SQLException;

/**
 * Project name(é¡¹ç›®åç§°)ï¼šDatabase_course_design_Java_Web_Implementation_of_student_information_management_system_based_on_MySQL
 * Package(åŒ…å): tools.test
 * Class(ç±»å): C3P0
 * Author(ä½œè€…ï¼‰: mao
 * Author QQï¼š1296193245
 * GitHubï¼šhttps://github.com/maomao124/
 * Date(åˆ›å»ºæ—¥æœŸ)ï¼š 2022/2/7
 * Time(åˆ›å»ºæ—¶é—´)ï¼š 22:53
 * Version(ç‰ˆæœ¬): 1.0
 * Description(æè¿°)ï¼š æ­¤åŒ…ä¸‹çš„æ‰€æœ‰ç±»ä¸»è¦ç”¨äºæµ‹è¯•druidè¿æ¥æ± ã€C3P0è¿æ¥æ± ã€è‡ªå®šä¹‰è¿æ¥æ± é€‚é…å™¨è®¾è®¡æ¨¡å¼ã€è‡ªå®šä¹‰è¿æ¥æ± åŠ¨æ€ä»£ç†æ–¹å¼ã€ä¸ä½¿ç”¨æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥æ± è¿™äº”ä¸ªä¹‹é—´çš„æ€§èƒ½å·®è·
 * é™¤äº†æµ‹è¯•ï¼Œå®é™…ä¸Šå¹¶æ²¡æœ‰ç”¨åˆ°æ­¤ç±»ã€‚æµ‹è¯•æ–¹æ³•ï¼šæ’å…¥100æ¡å­¦ç”Ÿæ•°æ®ã€100æ¡å­¦ç”Ÿå¯†ç æ•°æ®ã€1200æ¡æˆç»©çš„æ—¶é—´æ¶ˆè€—ï¼Œç²¾ç¡®åˆ°å¾®ç§’ã€‚
 */

public class C3P0
{
    private static final ComboPooledDataSource dataSource = new ComboPooledDataSource();

    public static java.sql.Connection getConnection()
    {
        java.sql.Connection connection = null;
        try
        {
            connection = dataSource.getConnection();
        }
        catch (SQLException e)
        {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
        return connection;
    }
}
ÿ
H:\³ÌĞò\´óÈıº®¼Ù\Êı¾İ¿â¿Î³ÌÉè¼Æ_»ùÓÚmysqlµÄÑ§ÉúĞÅÏ¢¹ÜÀíÏµÍ³javaWebÊµÏÖ\\src\\main\\java\\tools\\test\\Connection.java
package tools.test;

import tools.test.ConnectionAdapter;

import java.sql.SQLException;
import java.util.List;

/**
 * Project name(é¡¹ç›®åç§°)ï¼šDatabase_course_design_Java_Web_Implementation_of_student_information_management_system_based_on_MySQL
 * Package(åŒ…å): tools.test
 * Class(ç±»å): Connection
 * Author(ä½œè€…ï¼‰: mao
 * Author QQï¼š1296193245
 * GitHubï¼šhttps://github.com/maomao124/
 * Date(åˆ›å»ºæ—¥æœŸ)ï¼š 2022/2/7
 * Time(åˆ›å»ºæ—¶é—´)ï¼š 22:38
 * Version(ç‰ˆæœ¬): 1.0
 * Description(æè¿°)ï¼š æ­¤åŒ…ä¸‹çš„æ‰€æœ‰ç±»ä¸»è¦ç”¨äºæµ‹è¯•druidè¿æ¥æ± ã€C3P0è¿æ¥æ± ã€è‡ªå®šä¹‰è¿æ¥æ± é€‚é…å™¨è®¾è®¡æ¨¡å¼ã€è‡ªå®šä¹‰è¿æ¥æ± åŠ¨æ€ä»£ç†æ–¹å¼ã€ä¸ä½¿ç”¨æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥æ± è¿™äº”ä¸ªä¹‹é—´çš„æ€§èƒ½å·®è·
 * é™¤äº†æµ‹è¯•ï¼Œå®é™…ä¸Šå¹¶æ²¡æœ‰ç”¨åˆ°æ­¤ç±»ã€‚æµ‹è¯•æ–¹æ³•ï¼šæ’å…¥100æ¡å­¦ç”Ÿæ•°æ®ã€100æ¡å­¦ç”Ÿå¯†ç æ•°æ®ã€1200æ¡æˆç»©çš„æ—¶é—´æ¶ˆè€—ï¼Œç²¾ç¡®åˆ°å¾®ç§’ã€‚
 */

public class Connection extends ConnectionAdapter
{
    //è¿æ¥å¯¹è±¡
    private final java.sql.Connection connection;
    //è¿æ¥æ± 
    private final List<java.sql.Connection> pool;

    /**
     * æ„é€ æ–¹æ³•å¯¹æˆå‘˜å˜é‡èµ‹å€¼
     *
     * @param connection è¿æ¥å¯¹è±¡
     * @param pool       è¿æ¥æ± 
     */
    public Connection(java.sql.Connection connection, List<java.sql.Connection> pool)
    {
        super(connection);
        this.connection = connection;
        this.pool = pool;
    }

    //é‡å†™closeæ–¹æ³•

    /**
     * é‡å†™closeæ–¹æ³• å®Œæˆå½’è¿˜è¿æ¥æ“ä½œ
     *
     * @throws SQLException æŠ›å‡ºå¼‚å¸¸
     */
    @Override
    public void close() throws SQLException
    {
        connection.setAutoCommit(true);     //é‡æ–°å°†è¿æ¥è®¾ç½®ä¸ºè‡ªåŠ¨æäº¤
        pool.add(connection);               //å½’è¿˜è¿æ¥
    }
}
ÿ
H:\³ÌĞò\´óÈıº®¼Ù\Êı¾İ¿â¿Î³ÌÉè¼Æ_»ùÓÚmysqlµÄÑ§ÉúĞÅÏ¢¹ÜÀíÏµÍ³javaWebÊµÏÖ\\src\\main\\java\\tools\\test\\ConnectionAdapter.java
package tools.test;

import java.sql.*;
import java.util.Map;
import java.util.Properties;
import java.util.concurrent.Executor;

/**
 * Project name(é¡¹ç›®åç§°)ï¼šDatabase_course_design_Java_Web_Implementation_of_student_information_management_system_based_on_MySQL
 * Package(åŒ…å): tools.test
 * Class(ç±»å): ConnectionAdopt
 * Author(ä½œè€…ï¼‰: mao
 * Author QQï¼š1296193245
 * GitHubï¼šhttps://github.com/maomao124/
 * Date(åˆ›å»ºæ—¥æœŸ)ï¼š 2022/2/7
 * Time(åˆ›å»ºæ—¶é—´)ï¼š 22:36
 * Version(ç‰ˆæœ¬): 1.0
 * Description(æè¿°)ï¼š æ­¤åŒ…ä¸‹çš„æ‰€æœ‰ç±»ä¸»è¦ç”¨äºæµ‹è¯•druidè¿æ¥æ± ã€C3P0è¿æ¥æ± ã€è‡ªå®šä¹‰è¿æ¥æ± é€‚é…å™¨è®¾è®¡æ¨¡å¼ã€è‡ªå®šä¹‰è¿æ¥æ± åŠ¨æ€ä»£ç†æ–¹å¼ã€ä¸ä½¿ç”¨æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥æ± è¿™äº”ä¸ªä¹‹é—´çš„æ€§èƒ½å·®è·
 * é™¤äº†æµ‹è¯•ï¼Œå®é™…ä¸Šå¹¶æ²¡æœ‰ç”¨åˆ°æ­¤ç±»ã€‚æµ‹è¯•æ–¹æ³•ï¼šæ’å…¥100æ¡å­¦ç”Ÿæ•°æ®ã€100æ¡å­¦ç”Ÿå¯†ç æ•°æ®ã€1200æ¡æˆç»©çš„æ—¶é—´æ¶ˆè€—ï¼Œç²¾ç¡®åˆ°å¾®ç§’ã€‚
 */


public abstract class ConnectionAdapter implements java.sql.Connection
{
    //è¿æ¥å¯¹è±¡
    private final java.sql.Connection connection;

    public ConnectionAdapter(java.sql.Connection connection)
    {
        this.connection = connection;
    }

    @Override
    public Statement createStatement() throws SQLException
    {
        return connection.createStatement();
    }

    @Override
    public PreparedStatement prepareStatement(String sql) throws SQLException
    {
        return connection.prepareStatement(sql);
    }

    @Override
    public CallableStatement prepareCall(String sql) throws SQLException
    {
        return connection.prepareCall(sql);
    }

    @Override
    public String nativeSQL(String sql) throws SQLException
    {
        return connection.nativeSQL(sql);
    }

    @Override
    public void setAutoCommit(boolean autoCommit) throws SQLException
    {
        connection.setAutoCommit(autoCommit);
    }

    @Override
    public boolean getAutoCommit() throws SQLException
    {
        return connection.getAutoCommit();
    }

    @Override
    public void commit() throws SQLException
    {
        connection.commit();
    }

    @Override
    public void rollback() throws SQLException
    {
        connection.rollback();
    }


    @Override
    public boolean isClosed() throws SQLException
    {
        return connection.isClosed();
    }

    @Override
    public DatabaseMetaData getMetaData() throws SQLException
    {
        return connection.getMetaData();
    }

    @Override
    public void setReadOnly(boolean readOnly) throws SQLException
    {
        connection.setReadOnly(readOnly);
    }

    @Override
    public boolean isReadOnly() throws SQLException
    {
        return connection.isReadOnly();
    }

    @Override
    public void setCatalog(String catalog) throws SQLException
    {
        connection.setCatalog(catalog);
    }

    @Override
    public String getCatalog() throws SQLException
    {
        return connection.getCatalog();
    }

    @Override
    public void setTransactionIsolation(int level) throws SQLException
    {
        connection.setTransactionIsolation(level);
    }

    @Override
    public int getTransactionIsolation() throws SQLException
    {
        return connection.getTransactionIsolation();
    }

    @Override
    public SQLWarning getWarnings() throws SQLException
    {
        return connection.getWarnings();
    }

    @Override
    public void clearWarnings() throws SQLException
    {
        connection.clearWarnings();
    }

    @Override
    public Statement createStatement(int resultSetType, int resultSetConcurrency) throws SQLException
    {
        return connection.createStatement(resultSetType, resultSetConcurrency);
    }

    @Override
    public PreparedStatement prepareStatement(String sql, int resultSetType, int resultSetConcurrency)
            throws SQLException
    {
        return connection.prepareStatement(sql, resultSetType, resultSetConcurrency);
    }

    @Override
    public CallableStatement prepareCall(String sql, int resultSetType, int resultSetConcurrency) throws SQLException
    {
        return connection.prepareCall(sql, resultSetType, resultSetConcurrency);
    }

    @Override
    public Map<String, Class<?>> getTypeMap() throws SQLException
    {
        return connection.getTypeMap();
    }

    @Override
    public void setTypeMap(Map<String, Class<?>> map) throws SQLException
    {
        connection.setTypeMap(map);
    }

    @Override
    public void setHoldability(int holdability) throws SQLException
    {
        connection.setHoldability(holdability);
    }

    @Override
    public int getHoldability() throws SQLException
    {
        return connection.getHoldability();
    }

    @Override
    public Savepoint setSavepoint() throws SQLException
    {
        return connection.setSavepoint();
    }

    @Override
    public Savepoint setSavepoint(String name) throws SQLException
    {
        return connection.setSavepoint(name);
    }

    @Override
    public void rollback(Savepoint savepoint) throws SQLException
    {
        connection.rollback();
    }

    @Override
    public void releaseSavepoint(Savepoint savepoint) throws SQLException
    {
        connection.releaseSavepoint(savepoint);
    }

    @Override
    public Statement createStatement(int resultSetType, int resultSetConcurrency, int resultSetHoldability)
            throws SQLException
    {
        return connection.createStatement(resultSetType, resultSetConcurrency, resultSetConcurrency);
    }

    @Override
    public PreparedStatement prepareStatement(String sql, int resultSetType, int resultSetConcurrency, int resultSetHoldability)
            throws SQLException
    {
        return connection.prepareStatement(sql, resultSetType, resultSetConcurrency, resultSetHoldability);
    }

    @Override
    public CallableStatement prepareCall(String sql, int resultSetType, int resultSetConcurrency, int resultSetHoldability)
            throws SQLException
    {
        return connection.prepareCall(sql, resultSetType, resultSetConcurrency, resultSetHoldability);
    }

    @Override
    public PreparedStatement prepareStatement(String sql, int autoGeneratedKeys) throws SQLException
    {
        return connection.prepareStatement(sql, autoGeneratedKeys);
    }

    @Override
    public PreparedStatement prepareStatement(String sql, int[] columnIndexes) throws SQLException
    {
        return connection.prepareStatement(sql, columnIndexes);
    }

    @Override
    public PreparedStatement prepareStatement(String sql, String[] columnNames) throws SQLException
    {
        return connection.prepareStatement(sql, columnNames);
    }

    @Override
    public Clob createClob() throws SQLException
    {
        return connection.createClob();
    }

    @Override
    public Blob createBlob() throws SQLException
    {
        return connection.createBlob();
    }

    @Override
    public NClob createNClob() throws SQLException
    {
        return connection.createNClob();
    }

    @Override
    public SQLXML createSQLXML() throws SQLException
    {
        return connection.createSQLXML();
    }

    @Override
    public boolean isValid(int timeout) throws SQLException
    {
        return connection.isValid(timeout);
    }

    @Override
    public void setClientInfo(String name, String value) throws SQLClientInfoException
    {
        connection.setClientInfo(name, value);
    }

    @Override
    public void setClientInfo(Properties properties) throws SQLClientInfoException
    {
        connection.setClientInfo(properties);
    }

    @Override
    public String getClientInfo(String name) throws SQLException
    {
        return connection.getClientInfo(name);
    }

    @Override
    public Properties getClientInfo() throws SQLException
    {
        return connection.getClientInfo();
    }

    @Override
    public Array createArrayOf(String typeName, Object[] elements) throws SQLException
    {
        return connection.createArrayOf(typeName, elements);
    }

    @Override
    public Struct createStruct(String typeName, Object[] attributes) throws SQLException
    {
        return connection.createStruct(typeName, attributes);
    }

    @Override
    public void setSchema(String schema) throws SQLException
    {
        connection.setSchema(schema);
    }

    @Override
    public String getSchema() throws SQLException
    {
        return connection.getSchema();
    }

    @Override
    public void abort(Executor executor) throws SQLException
    {
        connection.abort(executor);
    }

    @Override
    public void setNetworkTimeout(Executor executor, int milliseconds) throws SQLException
    {
        connection.setNetworkTimeout(executor, milliseconds);
    }

    @Override
    public int getNetworkTimeout() throws SQLException
    {
        return connection.getNetworkTimeout();
    }

    @Override
    public <T> T unwrap(Class<T> iface) throws SQLException
    {
        return connection.unwrap(iface);
    }

    @Override
    public boolean isWrapperFor(Class<?> iface) throws SQLException
    {
        return connection.isWrapperFor(iface);
    }
}

package tools.test;

import javax.sql.DataSource;
import java.awt.*;

import java.sql.SQLException;

/**
 * Project name(é¡¹ç›®åç§°)ï¼šDatabase_course_design_Java_Web_Implementation_of_student_information_management_system_based_on_MySQL
 * Package(åŒ…å): tools.test

 * Author(ä½œè€…ï¼‰: mao

 * Version(ç‰ˆæœ¬): 1.0
 * Description(æè¿°)ï¼š æ­¤åŒ…ä¸‹çš„æ‰€æœ‰ç±»ä¸»è¦ç”¨äºæµ‹è¯•druidè¿æ¥æ± ã€C3P0è¿æ¥æ± ã€è‡ªå®šä¹‰è¿æ¥æ± é€‚é…å™¨è®¾è®¡æ¨¡å¼ã€è‡ªå®šä¹‰è¿æ¥æ± åŠ¨æ€ä»£ç†æ–¹å¼ã€ä¸ä½¿ç”¨æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥æ± è¿™äº”ä¸ªä¹‹é—´çš„æ€§èƒ½å·®è·
 * é™¤äº†æµ‹è¯•ï¼Œå®é™…ä¸Šå¹¶æ²¡æœ‰ç”¨åˆ°æ­¤ç±»ã€‚ æµ‹è¯•æ–¹æ³•ï¼šæ’å…¥100æ¡å­¦ç”Ÿæ•°æ®ã€100æ¡å­¦ç”Ÿå¯†ç æ•°æ®ã€1200æ¡æˆç»©çš„æ—¶é—´æ¶ˆè€—ï¼Œç²¾ç¡®åˆ°å¾®ç§’ã€‚

public class ConnectionPool implements DataSource
{
    //è¿æ¥æ± å¯¹è±¡çš„æ•°é‡
    private static final int ConnectionPoolSize = 10;

    //è¿æ¥æ± ï¼Œçº¿ç¨‹å®‰å…¨
    private static final List<java.sql.Connection> pool = Collections.synchronizedList(new ArrayList<>());

    static
    {
        try
        {
            for (int i = 0; i < ConnectionPoolSize; i++)
            {
                java.sql.Connection connection = JDBC.getConnection();
                pool.add(connection);
            }
        }
        catch (Exception e)
        {
            System.err.println("è¿æ¥æ± åˆå§‹åŒ–å¤±è´¥ï¼");
            Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().beep();
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }

    /**
     * è¿”å›è¿æ¥æ± å‰©ä½™çš„è¿æ¥æ•°é‡
     *
     * @return intå‹ è¿æ¥æ± å‰©ä½™çš„è¿æ¥æ•°é‡
     */
    public int getPoolSize()
    {
        return pool.size();
    }

    /**
     * è·å–è¿æ¥æ± æœ€å¤§è¿æ¥çš„æ•°é‡ï¼Œæ­¤æ•°é‡å›ºå®š
     *
     * @return intå‹ è¿”å›æœ€å¤§è¿æ¥çš„æ•°é‡
     */
    public static int getConnectionPoolSize()
    {
        return ConnectionPoolSize;
    }


    @SuppressWarnings("all")
    /**
     * è·å¾—è¿æ¥ åŠ¨æ€ä»£ç†æ–¹å¼
     *
     * @return åŠ å¼ºçš„è¿æ¥å¯¹è±¡ï¼Œæ­¤å¯¹è±¡è°ƒç”¨closeæ–¹æ³•å½’è¿˜è¿æ¥ï¼Œè€Œä¸æ˜¯å…³é—­è¿æ¥
     * @throws SQLException æ•°æ®åº“å¼‚å¸¸
     */
    /*
    @Override
    public Connection getConnection() throws SQLException
    {
        if (pool.size() > 0)
        {
            Connection connection = pool.remove(0);
            @SuppressWarnings("all")
            Connection proxy = (Connection) Proxy.newProxyInstance(connection.getClass().getClassLoader(), new Class[]{Connection.class}, new InvocationHandler()
            {
                @Override
                public Object invoke(Object proxy, Method method, Object[] args) throws Throwable
                {
                    if (method.getName().equals("close"))
                    {
                        //å½’è¿˜è¿æ¥
                        connection.setAutoCommit(true);     //é‡æ–°å°†è¿æ¥è®¾ç½®ä¸ºè‡ªåŠ¨æäº¤
                        pool.add(connection);               //å½’è¿˜è¿æ¥
                        return null;
                    }
                    else
                    {
                        return method.invoke(connection, args);
                    }
                }
            });
            return proxy;
        }
        else
        {
            throw new RuntimeException("è¿æ¥æ± è¿æ¥æ•°é‡å·²ç»ç”¨å°½ï¼");
        }
    }
     */

    /**
     * è·å¾—è¿æ¥ è£…é¥°è®¾è®¡æ¨¡å¼æˆ–è€…é€‚é…å™¨è®¾è®¡æ¨¡å¼
     *
     * @return åŠ å¼ºçš„è¿æ¥å¯¹è±¡ï¼Œæ­¤å¯¹è±¡è°ƒç”¨closeæ–¹æ³•å½’è¿˜è¿æ¥ï¼Œè€Œä¸æ˜¯å…³é—­è¿æ¥
     * @throws SQLException æ•°æ®åº“å¼‚å¸¸
     */
    @Override
    public Connection getConnection() throws SQLException
    {
        if (pool.size() > 0)
        {
            java.sql.Connection connection = pool.remove(0);
            @SuppressWarnings("all")
            Connection con = new Connection(connection, pool);
            return con;
        }
        else
        {
            throw new RuntimeException("è¿æ¥æ± è¿æ¥æ•°é‡å·²ç»ç”¨å°½ï¼");
        }
    }


    @Override
    public Connection getConnection(String username, String password) throws SQLException
    {
        return null;
    }

    @Override
    public PrintWriter getLogWriter() throws SQLException
    {
        return null;
    }

    @Override
    public void setLogWriter(PrintWriter out) throws SQLException
    {

    }

    @Override
    public void setLoginTimeout(int seconds) throws SQLException
    {

    }

    @Override
    public int getLoginTimeout() throws SQLException
    {
        return 0;
    }

    @Override
    public Logger getParentLogger() throws SQLFeatureNotSupportedException
    {
        return null;
    }

    @Override
    public <T> T unwrap(Class<T> iface) throws SQLException
    {
        return null;
    }

    @Override
    public boolean isWrapperFor(Class<?> iface) throws SQLException
    {
        return false;
    }

H:\³ÌĞò\´óÈıº®¼Ù\Êı¾İ¿â¿Î³ÌÉè¼Æ_»ùÓÚmysqlµÄÑ§ÉúĞÅÏ¢¹ÜÀíÏµÍ³javaWebÊµÏÖ\\src\\main\\java\\tools\\test\\JDBC.java
package tools.test;

import java.awt.*;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.InputStream;
import java.sql.*;
import java.util.Properties;

/**
 * Project name(é¡¹ç›®åç§°)ï¼šDatabase_course_design_Java_Web_Implementation_of_student_information_management_system_based_on_MySQL
 * Package(åŒ…å): tools.test
 * Class(ç±»å): JDBC
 * Author(ä½œè€…ï¼‰: mao
 * Author QQï¼š1296193245
 * GitHubï¼šhttps://github.com/maomao124/
 * Date(åˆ›å»ºæ—¥æœŸ)ï¼š 2022/2/7
 * Time(åˆ›å»ºæ—¶é—´)ï¼š 22:33
 * Version(ç‰ˆæœ¬): 1.0
 * Description(æè¿°)ï¼š æ­¤åŒ…ä¸‹çš„æ‰€æœ‰ç±»ä¸»è¦ç”¨äºæµ‹è¯•druidè¿æ¥æ± ã€C3P0è¿æ¥æ± ã€è‡ªå®šä¹‰è¿æ¥æ± é€‚é…å™¨è®¾è®¡æ¨¡å¼ã€è‡ªå®šä¹‰è¿æ¥æ± åŠ¨æ€ä»£ç†æ–¹å¼ã€ä¸ä½¿ç”¨æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥æ± è¿™äº”ä¸ªä¹‹é—´çš„æ€§èƒ½å·®è·
 * é™¤äº†æµ‹è¯•ï¼Œå®é™…ä¸Šå¹¶æ²¡æœ‰ç”¨åˆ°æ­¤ç±»ã€‚æµ‹è¯•æ–¹æ³•ï¼šæ’å…¥100æ¡å­¦ç”Ÿæ•°æ®ã€100æ¡å­¦ç”Ÿå¯†ç æ•°æ®ã€1200æ¡æˆç»©çš„æ—¶é—´æ¶ˆè€—ï¼Œç²¾ç¡®åˆ°å¾®ç§’ã€‚
 */


public class JDBC
{

    /*
    config.propertiesæ–‡ä»¶å†…å®¹ï¼š

    driverClass=com.mysql.cj.jdbc.Driver
    url=jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/student1
    username=root
    password=20010713

     */

    @SuppressWarnings("all")
    private static String driverClass;              //é©±åŠ¨ç¨‹åºç±»
    private static String url;                      //url
    private static String username;                 //ç”¨æˆ·å
    private static String password;                 //å¯†ç 

    private JDBC()
    {

    }

    static
    {
        InputStream inputStream;
        Properties properties;
        try
        {
            //srcç›®å½•ä¸‹,maven èµ„æºè·¯å¾„ä¸‹
            inputStream = JDBC.class.getClassLoader().getResourceAsStream("config.properties");
            properties = new Properties();
            properties.load(inputStream);
            driverClass = properties.getProperty("driverClass");      //è¯»å–é©±åŠ¨ç¨‹åºç±»
            url = properties.getProperty("url");                       //è¯»å–url
            username = properties.getProperty("username");           //è¯»å–ç”¨æˆ·å
            password = properties.getProperty("password");          //è¯»å–å¯†ç 

            //System.out.println(driverClass);
            //System.out.println(url);
            //System.out.println(username);
            //System.out.println(password);

            //æ³¨å†Œé©±åŠ¨
            Class.forName(driverClass);                             //æ–°ç‰ˆ
            //æ—§ç‰ˆï¼šcom.mysql.jdbc.Driver
        }
        catch (IOException e)
        {
            Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().beep();
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
        catch (ClassNotFoundException e)
        {
            Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().beep();
            System.err.println("é©±åŠ¨ç¨‹åºç±»åŠ è½½å¤±è´¥!");
            System.err.println(e.getMessage());
        }
    }

    //è¿æ¥æ–¹æ³•

    /**
     * è·å–æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥å¯¹è±¡
     *
     * @return Connectionå¯¹è±¡
     * @throws Exception è·å–å¯¹è±¡å¤±è´¥æ—¶æŠ›å‡º
     */
    public static java.sql.Connection getConnection() throws Exception
    {
        java.sql.Connection connection = null;

        //Loading class `com.mysql.jdbc.Driver'. This is deprecated.
        // The new driver class is `com.mysql.cj.jdbc.Driver'.
        // The driver is automatically registered via the SPI and manual loading of the driver class is generally unnecessary.
        connection = DriverManager.getConnection(url, username, password);
        return connection;
    }

    //å…³é—­æ–¹æ³•

    /**
     * å…³é—­æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥  3ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡ï¼Œç”¨äºå…³é—­æŸ¥è¯¢çš„è¿æ¥ 123
     *
     * @param connection æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥å¯¹è±¡
     * @param statement  Statementå¯¹è±¡
     * @param resultSet  ç»“æœé›†å¯¹è±¡
     */
    public static void close(Connection connection, Statement statement, ResultSet resultSet)
    {
        if (resultSet != null)
        {
            try
            {
                resultSet.close();
            }
            catch (Exception e)
            {
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
        }
        if (statement != null)
        {
            try
            {
                statement.close();
            }
            catch (Exception e)
            {
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
        }
        if (connection != null)
        {
            try
            {
                connection.close();
            }
            catch (Exception e)
            {
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
        }
    }

    /**
     * å…³é—­æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥  3ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡ï¼Œç”¨äºå…³é—­æŸ¥è¯¢çš„è¿æ¥ 132
     *
     * @param connection æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥å¯¹è±¡
     * @param statement  Statementå¯¹è±¡
     * @param resultSet  ç»“æœé›†å¯¹è±¡
     */
    public static void close(Connection connection, ResultSet resultSet, Statement statement)
    {
        close(connection, statement, resultSet);
    }

    /**
     * å…³é—­æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥  3ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡ï¼Œç”¨äºå…³é—­æŸ¥è¯¢çš„è¿æ¥ 213
     *
     * @param connection æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥å¯¹è±¡
     * @param statement  Statementå¯¹è±¡
     * @param resultSet  ç»“æœé›†å¯¹è±¡
     */
    public static void close(Statement statement, Connection connection, ResultSet resultSet)
    {
        close(connection, statement, resultSet);
    }

    /**
     * å…³é—­æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥  3ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡ï¼Œç”¨äºå…³é—­æŸ¥è¯¢çš„è¿æ¥ 231
     *
     * @param connection æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥å¯¹è±¡
     * @param statement  Statementå¯¹è±¡
     * @param resultSet  ç»“æœé›†å¯¹è±¡
     */
    public static void close(Statement statement, ResultSet resultSet, Connection connection)
    {
        close(connection, statement, resultSet);
    }

    /**
     * å…³é—­æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥  3ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡ï¼Œç”¨äºå…³é—­æŸ¥è¯¢çš„è¿æ¥ 312
     *
     * @param connection æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥å¯¹è±¡
     * @param statement  Statementå¯¹è±¡
     * @param resultSet  ç»“æœé›†å¯¹è±¡
     */
    public static void close(ResultSet resultSet, Connection connection, Statement statement)
    {
        close(connection, statement, resultSet);
    }

    /**
     * å…³é—­æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥  3ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡ï¼Œç”¨äºå…³é—­æŸ¥è¯¢çš„è¿æ¥ 321
     *
     * @param connection æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥å¯¹è±¡
     * @param statement  Statementå¯¹è±¡
     * @param resultSet  ç»“æœé›†å¯¹è±¡
     */
    public static void close(ResultSet resultSet, Statement statement, Connection connection)
    {
        close(connection, statement, resultSet);
    }

    /**
     * å…³é—­æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥  3ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡ï¼Œç”¨äºå…³é—­é¢„ç¼–è¯‘çš„æŸ¥è¯¢çš„è¿æ¥ 123
     *
     * @param connection        æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥å¯¹è±¡
     * @param preparedStatement PreparedStatementå¯¹è±¡
     * @param resultSet         ç»“æœé›†å¯¹è±¡
     */
    public static void close(Connection connection, PreparedStatement preparedStatement, ResultSet resultSet)
    {
        if (resultSet != null)
        {
            try
            {
                resultSet.close();
            }
            catch (Exception e)
            {
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
        }
        if (preparedStatement != null)
        {
            try
            {
                preparedStatement.close();
            }
            catch (Exception e)
            {
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
        }
        if (connection != null)
        {
            try
            {
                connection.close();
            }
            catch (Exception e)
            {
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
        }
    }

    /**
     * å…³é—­æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥  3ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡ï¼Œç”¨äºå…³é—­é¢„ç¼–è¯‘çš„æŸ¥è¯¢çš„è¿æ¥ 132
     *
     * @param connection        æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥å¯¹è±¡
     * @param preparedStatement PreparedStatementå¯¹è±¡
     * @param resultSet         ç»“æœé›†å¯¹è±¡
     */
    public static void close(Connection connection, ResultSet resultSet, PreparedStatement preparedStatement)
    {
        close(connection, preparedStatement, resultSet);
    }

    /**
     * å…³é—­æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥  3ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡ï¼Œç”¨äºå…³é—­é¢„ç¼–è¯‘çš„æŸ¥è¯¢çš„è¿æ¥ 213
     *
     * @param connection        æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥å¯¹è±¡
     * @param preparedStatement PreparedStatementå¯¹è±¡
     * @param resultSet         ç»“æœé›†å¯¹è±¡
     */
    public static void close(PreparedStatement preparedStatement, Connection connection, ResultSet resultSet)
    {
        close(connection, preparedStatement, resultSet);
    }

    /**
     * å…³é—­æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥  3ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡ï¼Œç”¨äºå…³é—­é¢„ç¼–è¯‘çš„æŸ¥è¯¢çš„è¿æ¥ 231
     *
     * @param connection        æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥å¯¹è±¡
     * @param preparedStatement PreparedStatementå¯¹è±¡
     * @param resultSet         ç»“æœé›†å¯¹è±¡
     */
    public static void close(PreparedStatement preparedStatement, ResultSet resultSet, Connection connection)
    {
        close(connection, preparedStatement, resultSet);
    }

    /**
     * å…³é—­æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥  3ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡ï¼Œç”¨äºå…³é—­é¢„ç¼–è¯‘çš„æŸ¥è¯¢çš„è¿æ¥ 312
     *
     * @param connection        æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥å¯¹è±¡
     * @param preparedStatement PreparedStatementå¯¹è±¡
     * @param resultSet         ç»“æœé›†å¯¹è±¡
     */
    public static void close(ResultSet resultSet, Connection connection, PreparedStatement preparedStatement)
    {
        close(connection, preparedStatement, resultSet);
    }

    /**
     * å…³é—­æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥  3ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡ï¼Œç”¨äºå…³é—­é¢„ç¼–è¯‘çš„æŸ¥è¯¢çš„è¿æ¥ 321
     *
     * @param connection        æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥å¯¹è±¡
     * @param preparedStatement PreparedStatementå¯¹è±¡
     * @param resultSet         ç»“æœé›†å¯¹è±¡
     */
    public static void close(ResultSet resultSet, PreparedStatement preparedStatement, Connection connection)
    {
        close(connection, preparedStatement, resultSet);
    }


    /**
     * å…³é—­æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥  2ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡ï¼Œç”¨äºå…³é—­æ›´æ–°çš„è¿æ¥ 12
     *
     * @param connection æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥å¯¹è±¡
     * @param statement  Statementå¯¹è±¡
     */
    public static void close(Connection connection, Statement statement)
    {
        if (statement != null)
        {
            try
            {
                statement.close();
            }
            catch (Exception e)
            {
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
        }
        if (connection != null)
        {
            try
            {
                connection.close();
            }
            catch (Exception e)
            {
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
        }
    }

    /**
     * å…³é—­æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥  2ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡ï¼Œç”¨äºå…³é—­æ›´æ–°çš„è¿æ¥ 21
     *
     * @param connection æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥å¯¹è±¡
     * @param statement  Statementå¯¹è±¡
     */
    public static void close(Statement statement, Connection connection)
    {
        close(connection, statement);
    }

    /**
     * å…³é—­æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥  2ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡ï¼Œç”¨äºå…³é—­é¢„ç¼–è¯‘çš„æ›´æ–°çš„è¿æ¥ 12
     *
     * @param connection        æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥å¯¹è±¡
     * @param preparedStatement PreparedStatementå¯¹è±¡
     */
    public static void close(Connection connection, PreparedStatement preparedStatement)
    {
        if (preparedStatement != null)
        {
            try
            {
                preparedStatement.close();
            }
            catch (Exception e)
            {
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
        }
        if (connection != null)
        {
            try
            {
                connection.close();
            }
            catch (Exception e)
            {
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
        }
    }

    /**
     * å…³é—­æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥  2ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡ï¼Œç”¨äºå…³é—­é¢„ç¼–è¯‘çš„æ›´æ–°çš„è¿æ¥ 21
     *
     * @param connection        æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥å¯¹è±¡
     * @param preparedStatement PreparedStatementå¯¹è±¡
     */
    public static void close(PreparedStatement preparedStatement, Connection connection)
    {
        close(connection, preparedStatement);
    }
}

<%@ page import="java.util.regex.Matcher" %>
<%@ page import="table.AdministratorsPassword" %><%--
  Created by IntelliJ IDEA.
  Project name(é¡¹ç›®åç§°)ï¼šDatabase_course_design_Java_Web_Implementation_of_student_information_management_system_based_on_MySQL

<%@ page contentType="text/html;charset=UTF-8" language="java" %>
<html>
<head>
    <title>æ›´æ”¹å¯†ç -ç»“æœ</title>

            background-color: skyblue;

<%
    request.setCharacterEncoding("utf-8");
    //è·å–ä¿¡æ¯
    String administrator_no_str = request.getParameter("administrator_no");
    String old_password = request.getParameter("old_password");
    String password1 = request.getParameter("password1");
    String password2 = request.getParameter("password2");


    //åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºç©º
    if (administrator_no_str == null || administrator_no_str.equals(""))
    {
        //æŠŠé”™è¯¯ä¿¡æ¯å†™å…¥sessioné‡Œ
        session.setAttribute("message", "æ­¤é¡µé¢ä¸èƒ½å•ç‹¬è®¿é—®ï¼");
        //è½¬å‘è‡³é”™è¯¯é¡µé¢
        request.getRequestDispatcher("Error.jsp").forward(request, response);
        return;
    }
    if (old_password == null || old_password.equals(""))
    {
        //æŠŠé”™è¯¯ä¿¡æ¯å†™å…¥sessioné‡Œ
        session.setAttribute("message", "è¯·è¾“å…¥åŸå¯†ç ï¼");
        //è½¬å‘è‡³é”™è¯¯é¡µé¢
        request.getRequestDispatcher("Error.jsp").forward(request, response);
        return;
    }
    if (password1 == null || password1.equals(""))
    {
        //æŠŠé”™è¯¯ä¿¡æ¯å†™å…¥sessioné‡Œ
        session.setAttribute("message", "è¯·è¾“å…¥æ–°å¯†ç ï¼");
        //è½¬å‘è‡³é”™è¯¯é¡µé¢
        request.getRequestDispatcher("Error.jsp").forward(request, response);
        return;
    }
    if (password2 == null || password2.equals(""))
    {
        //æŠŠé”™è¯¯ä¿¡æ¯å†™å…¥sessioné‡Œ
        session.setAttribute("message", "è¯·è¾“å…¥æ–°å¯†ç ï¼");
        //è½¬å‘è‡³é”™è¯¯é¡µé¢
        request.getRequestDispatcher("Error.jsp").forward(request, response);
        return;
    }

    //åˆ¤æ–­æ–°å¯†ç æ˜¯å¦ä¸€è‡´
    if (!password1.equals(password2))
    {
        //æŠŠé”™è¯¯ä¿¡æ¯å†™å…¥sessioné‡Œ
        session.setAttribute("message", "è¾“å…¥çš„ä¸¤æ¬¡å¯†ç ä¸ä¸€è‡´ï¼");
        //è½¬å‘è‡³é”™è¯¯é¡µé¢
        request.getRequestDispatcher("Error.jsp").forward(request, response);
        return;
    }

    //åˆ¤æ–­é•¿åº¦
    if (password1.length() < 6)
    {
        //æŠŠé”™è¯¯ä¿¡æ¯å†™å…¥sessioné‡Œ
        session.setAttribute("message", "å¯†ç é•¿åº¦å¤ªçŸ­ï¼");
        //è½¬å‘è‡³é”™è¯¯é¡µé¢
        request.getRequestDispatcher("Error.jsp").forward(request, response);
        return;
    }
    if (password1.length() > 20)
    {
        //æŠŠé”™è¯¯ä¿¡æ¯å†™å…¥sessioné‡Œ
        session.setAttribute("message", "å¯†ç é•¿åº¦å¤ªé•¿ï¼");
        //è½¬å‘è‡³é”™è¯¯é¡µé¢
        request.getRequestDispatcher("Error.jsp").forward(request, response);
        return;
    }

    //å¯†ç ç”±å¤§å°å†™å’Œæ•°å­—æ„æˆ
    Pattern pattern = Pattern.compile("^[\\w]*$");
    Matcher matcher = pattern.matcher(password1);
    boolean result = matcher.matches();
    if (!result)
    {
        //æŠŠé”™è¯¯ä¿¡æ¯å†™å…¥sessioné‡Œ
        session.setAttribute("message", "å¯†ç åº”è¯¥ç”±å¤§å°å†™å­—æ¯å’Œæ•°å­—æ„æˆï¼");
        //è½¬å‘è‡³é”™è¯¯é¡µé¢
        request.getRequestDispatcher("Error.jsp").forward(request, response);
        return;
    }

    //è½¬æ¢æˆæ•°å­—
    Long administrator_no = null;
    try
    {
        administrator_no = Long.parseLong(administrator_no_str);
    }
    catch (Exception e)
    {
        //æŠŠé”™è¯¯ä¿¡æ¯å†™å…¥sessioné‡Œ
        session.setAttribute("message", "èŒå·¥å·ä¸ä¸ºæ•°å­—ï¼");
        //è½¬å‘è‡³é”™è¯¯é¡µé¢
        request.getRequestDispatcher("Error.jsp").forward(request, response);
        return;
    }

    //éªŒè¯æ—§å¯†ç 
    boolean verification = AdministratorsPassword.verification(administrator_no, old_password);
    if (!verification)
    {
        //æŠŠé”™è¯¯ä¿¡æ¯å†™å…¥sessioné‡Œ
        session.setAttribute("message", "åŸå¯†ç ä¸æ­£ç¡®ï¼");
        //è½¬å‘è‡³é”™è¯¯é¡µé¢
        request.getRequestDispatcher("Error.jsp").forward(request, response);
        return;
    }
    //æ›´æ”¹å¯†ç 
    boolean b = AdministratorsPassword.changePassword(administrator_no, old_password, password1);
    if (!b)
    {
        //æŠŠé”™è¯¯ä¿¡æ¯å†™å…¥sessioné‡Œ
        session.setAttribute("message", "å¯†ç æ›´æ”¹å¤±è´¥ï¼");
        //è½¬å‘è‡³é”™è¯¯é¡µé¢
        request.getRequestDispatcher("Error.jsp").forward(request, response);
        return;
    }
%>

    align-items: center;

}

a::before, a::after {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    width: 0.6em;
    height: 0.6em;
    background-color: gainsboro;
    top: calc(50% - 0.3em);
    border-radius: 50%;
    transition: 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.5, -0.5, 0.25, 1.5);
}

a::before {
    left: 0;
    z-index: -1;
}

a::after {
    right: 0;
    z-index: -2;
}

/* æ·»åŠ æ‚¬æµ®æ•ˆæœ */
a:hover {
    color: deeppink;
}

    width: 32vmin;
    height: 32vmin;
    background-color: teal;
    border-radius: 43% 40% 43% 40%;
    bottom: calc(-1 * 32vmin / 2 - 4vmin);
    left: -2vmin;
    animation: wander 5s linear infinite alternate,
    wave 3s linear infinite,
    bounce 1s infinite alternate;
}

.eyes {
    width: 24vmin;
    height: 5vmin;
    position: absolute;
    bottom: 2vmin;
    left: calc(32vmin - 24vmin - 2vmin);
    animation: wander 5s linear infinite alternate;
}

.eyes::before,
.eyes::after {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    width: 5vmin;
    height: 5vmin;
    border: 1.25vmin solid white;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    border-radius: 50%;
    animation: blink 3s linear infinite;
}

.eyes::before {
    left: 4vmin;
}

.eyes::after {
    right: 4vmin;
}

@keyframes bounce {
    to {
        bottom: calc(-1 * 32vmin / 2 - 2vmin);
    }
}

@keyframes wave {
    to {
        transform: rotate(1turn);
    }
}

@keyframes wander {
    to {
        left: calc(100vw - 32vmin + 2vmin);
    }
}

@keyframes blink {
    4%, 10%, 34%, 40% {
        transform: scaleY(1);
    }

    7%, 37% {
        transform: scaleY(0);
    }
}

<%@ page import="table.Customize" %><%--
  Created by IntelliJ IDEA.
  Project name(é¡¹ç›®åç§°)ï¼šDatabase_course_design_Java_Web_Implementation_of_student_information_management_system_based_on_MySQL
  File name(æ–‡ä»¶å): custom_query_result
  Author(ä½œè€…ï¼‰: mao
  Author QQï¼š1296193245
  GitHubï¼šhttps://github.com/maomao124/
  Date(åˆ›å»ºæ—¥æœŸ)ï¼š 2022/2/12
  Time(åˆ›å»ºæ—¶é—´)ï¼š 19:10
  Description(æè¿°)ï¼š æ— 
--%>
<%@ page contentType="text/html;charset=UTF-8" language="java" %>
<html>
<head>
    <title>è‡ªå®šä¹‰æŸ¥è¯¢-ç»“æœ</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../animate.css">
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="css/link.css">
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="css/table_student.css">
    <style>
        body {
            background: skyblue;
        }
        div.text {
            border: 10px violet dotted;
            text-align: center;
            font-size: 32px;
            color: tomato;
            background: bisque;
        }

        div.text_p {
            position: absolute;
            top: 2%;
            left: 50%;
            transform: translate(-50%, 0%);
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>
<%
    request.setCharacterEncoding("utf-8");
    //è·å–ä¿¡æ¯
    String sql = request.getParameter("sql");
    //åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºç©º
    if (sql == null || sql.equals(""))
    {
        //æŠŠé”™è¯¯ä¿¡æ¯å†™å…¥sessioné‡Œ
        session.setAttribute("message", "æäº¤çš„SQLè¯­å¥ä¸ºç©ºæˆ–è€…å•ç‹¬è®¿é—®æ­¤é¡µé¢ï¼");
        //è½¬å‘è‡³é”™è¯¯é¡µé¢
        request.getRequestDispatcher("Error.jsp").forward(request, response);
        return;
    }
    //åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦åŒ…å«SELECTå…³é”®å­—
    if (!sql.toLowerCase().contains("select"))
    {
        //æŠŠé”™è¯¯ä¿¡æ¯å†™å…¥sessioné‡Œ
        session.setAttribute("message", "æäº¤çš„SQLè¯­å¥åº”è¯¥è¦åŒ…å«selectå…³é”®å­—ï¼");
        //è½¬å‘è‡³é”™è¯¯é¡µé¢
        request.getRequestDispatcher("Error.jsp").forward(request, response);
        return;
    }
    //ä¸æ˜¯æ›´æ–°è¯­å¥
    if (sql.toLowerCase().contains("update") && sql.toLowerCase().contains("set"))
    {
        //æŠŠé”™è¯¯ä¿¡æ¯å†™å…¥sessioné‡Œ
        session.setAttribute("message", "æäº¤çš„SQLè¯­å¥ä¸èƒ½åŒ…å«updateå…³é”®å­—ï¼");
        //è½¬å‘è‡³é”™è¯¯é¡µé¢
        request.getRequestDispatcher("Error.jsp").forward(request, response);
        return;
    }
    if (sql.toLowerCase().contains("delete") && sql.toLowerCase().contains("from"))
    {
        //æŠŠé”™è¯¯ä¿¡æ¯å†™å…¥sessioné‡Œ
        session.setAttribute("message", "æäº¤çš„SQLè¯­å¥ä¸èƒ½åŒ…å«deleteå…³é”®å­—ï¼");
        //è½¬å‘è‡³é”™è¯¯é¡µé¢
        request.getRequestDispatcher("Error.jsp").forward(request, response);
        return;
    }
    //ä¸èƒ½åŒ…å«passwordå…³é”®å­—
    if (sql.toLowerCase().contains("password"))
    {
        //æŠŠé”™è¯¯ä¿¡æ¯å†™å…¥sessioné‡Œ
        session.setAttribute("message", "æäº¤çš„SQLè¯­å¥ä¸èƒ½åŒ…å«passwordå…³é”®å­—ï¼");
        //è½¬å‘è‡³é”™è¯¯é¡µé¢
        request.getRequestDispatcher("Error.jsp").forward(request, response);
        return;
    }

    //æŸ¥è¯¢
    Object[][] objects = Customize.queryForArray(sql);
    //åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦é”™è¯¯
    if (Customize.isError)
    {
        //æŠŠé”™è¯¯ä¿¡æ¯å†™å…¥sessioné‡Œ
        session.setAttribute("message", table.Customize.getErrorMessage());
        //è½¬å‘è‡³é”™è¯¯é¡µé¢
        request.getRequestDispatcher("Error.jsp").forward(request, response);
        return;
    }
%>

<a class="back" href="index.jsp">è¿”å›</a>
<div class="text_p">
    <div class="text animated bounceInUp">
        è‡ªå®šä¹‰æŸ¥è¯¢ç»“æœ
    </div>
</div>

<table class="animated headShake">
    <caption>
        <br/>
    </caption>
    <br/>
    <tr>
        <!-- thä¸ºè¡¨æ ¼æ ‡é¢˜æ -->
        <%
            for (int i = 0; i < objects[0].length; i++)
            {
        %>
        <th>
            <%=objects[0][i]%>
        </th>
        <%
            }
        %>

    </tr>
    <%
        for (int i = 1; i < objects.length; i++)
        {
    %>
    <tr>
        <%
            for (int j = 0; j < objects[i].length; j++)
            {

        %>
        <td>
            <%=objects[i][j]%>
        </td>
        <%
            }
        %>
    </tr>
    <%
        }
    %>
</table>

<%
    //ä»requesté‡Œè·å–å‚æ•°
    String no_str = request.getParameter("no");
    //åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºç©º
    if (no_str == null || no_str.equals(""))
    {
        //æŠŠé”™è¯¯ä¿¡æ¯å†™å…¥sessioné‡Œ
        session.setAttribute("message", "æ­¤é¡µé¢ä¸èƒ½å•ç‹¬è®¿é—®ï¼");
        //è½¬å‘è‡³é”™è¯¯é¡µé¢
        request.getRequestDispatcher("Error.jsp").forward(request, response);
        return;
    }
    //è½¬æ¢æˆæ•°å­—
    Long no = null;
    try
    {
        assert no_str != null;
        no = Long.parseLong(no_str);
    }
    catch (Exception e)
    {
        //æŠŠé”™è¯¯ä¿¡æ¯å†™å…¥sessioné‡Œ
        session.setAttribute("message", "æ­¤é¡µé¢ä¼ å…¥çš„å‚æ•°å¿…é¡»ä¸ºæ•°å­—ï¼");
        //è½¬å‘è‡³é”™è¯¯é¡µé¢
        request.getRequestDispatcher("Error.jsp").forward(request, response);
        return;
    }
    //åˆ¤æ–­å­¦ç”Ÿæ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨
    data.Student student = table.Student.getStudent(no);
    if (student == null)
    {
        //æŠŠé”™è¯¯ä¿¡æ¯å†™å…¥sessioné‡Œ
        session.setAttribute("message", "æ­¤å­¦ç”Ÿä¸å­˜åœ¨ï¼");
        //è½¬å‘è‡³é”™è¯¯é¡µé¢
        request.getRequestDispatcher("Error.jsp").forward(request, response);
        return;
    }
    assert student != null;
%>

<%
    request.setCharacterEncoding("utf-8");
    //è·å–ä¿¡æ¯
    String class_no_str = request.getParameter("class_no");

    //åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºç©º
    if (class_no_str == null || class_no_str.equals(""))
    {
        //æŠŠé”™è¯¯ä¿¡æ¯å†™å…¥sessioné‡Œ
        session.setAttribute("message", "è¯·è¾“å…¥ç­çº§ç¼–å·ï¼");
        //è½¬å‘è‡³é”™è¯¯é¡µé¢
        request.getRequestDispatcher("Error.jsp").forward(request, response);
        return;
    }

    //è½¬æ¢æˆæ•°å­—
    Long class_no = null;
    try
    {
        class_no = Long.parseLong(class_no_str);
    }
    catch (Exception e)
    {
        //æŠŠé”™è¯¯ä¿¡æ¯å†™å…¥sessioné‡Œ
        session.setAttribute("message", "ç­çº§ç¼–å·ä¸ä¸ºæ•°å­—ï¼");
        //è½¬å‘è‡³é”™è¯¯é¡µé¢
        request.getRequestDispatcher("Error.jsp").forward(request, response);
        return;
    }

    //åˆ¤æ–­ç­çº§ç¼–å·æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨
    data.Class classInformation = table.Class.getClassInformation(class_no);
    if (classInformation == null)
    {
        //æŠŠé”™è¯¯ä¿¡æ¯å†™å…¥sessioné‡Œ
        session.setAttribute("message", "è¯¥ç­çº§ä¸å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œæ— æ³•åˆ é™¤ï¼");
        //è½¬å‘è‡³é”™è¯¯é¡µé¢
        request.getRequestDispatcher("Error.jsp").forward(request, response);
        return;
    }

    //åˆ é™¤ç­çº§
    boolean result = table.Class.delete(class_no);
    if (!result)
    {
        //æŠŠé”™è¯¯ä¿¡æ¯å†™å…¥sessioné‡Œ
        session.setAttribute("message", "ç­çº§åˆ é™¤å¤±è´¥ï¼");
        //è½¬å‘è‡³é”™è¯¯é¡µé¢
        request.getRequestDispatcher("Error.jsp").forward(request, response);
        return;
    }
%>

<%
    request.setCharacterEncoding("utf-8");
    //è·å–ä¿¡æ¯
    String course_no_str = request.getParameter("course_no");
    //åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºç©º
    if (course_no_str == null || course_no_str.equals(""))
    {
        //æŠŠé”™è¯¯ä¿¡æ¯å†™å…¥sessioné‡Œ
        session.setAttribute("message", "æ­¤é¡µé¢ä¸èƒ½å•ç‹¬è®¿é—®ï¼");
        //è½¬å‘è‡³é”™è¯¯é¡µé¢
        request.getRequestDispatcher("Error.jsp").forward(request, response);
        return;
    }

    //è½¬æ¢æˆæ•°å­—
    Long course_no = null;
    try
    {
        course_no = Long.parseLong(course_no_str);
    }
    catch (Exception e)
    {
        //æŠŠé”™è¯¯ä¿¡æ¯å†™å…¥sessioné‡Œ
        session.setAttribute("message", "è¯¾ç¨‹ç¼–å·ä¸ä¸ºæ•°å­—ï¼");
        //è½¬å‘è‡³é”™è¯¯é¡µé¢
        request.getRequestDispatcher("Error.jsp").forward(request, response);
        return;
    }

    //åˆ¤æ–­è¯¾ç¨‹ç¼–å·æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨
    data.Course courseInformation = table.Course.getCourseInformation(course_no);
    if (courseInformation == null)
    {
        //æŠŠé”™è¯¯ä¿¡æ¯å†™å…¥sessioné‡Œ
        session.setAttribute("message", "è¯¥è¯¾ç¨‹ä¸å­˜åœ¨ï¼");
        //è½¬å‘è‡³é”™è¯¯é¡µé¢
        request.getRequestDispatcher("Error.jsp").forward(request, response);
        return;
    }

    //åˆ é™¤è¯¾ç¨‹
    boolean result = table.Course.delete(course_no);
    if (!result)
    {
        //æŠŠé”™è¯¯ä¿¡æ¯å†™å…¥sessioné‡Œ
        session.setAttribute("message", "è¯¾ç¨‹åˆ é™¤å¤±è´¥ï¼");
        //è½¬å‘è‡³é”™è¯¯é¡µé¢
        request.getRequestDispatcher("Error.jsp").forward(request, response);
        return;
    }

<%
    //è·å–å½“å‰é¡µé¢
    request.setCharacterEncoding("utf-8");
    String curr_page_str = request.getParameter("page");
    //åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºç©º
    if (curr_page_str == null || curr_page_str.equals(""))
    {
        //èµ‹å€¼ï¼Œç¬¬ä¸€é¡µ
        curr_page_str = "1";
    }

    //è½¬æ•°å­—
    Long curr_page = null;
    try
    {
        curr_page = Long.parseLong(curr_page_str);
    }
    catch (Exception e)
    {
        //æŠŠé”™è¯¯ä¿¡æ¯å†™å…¥sessioné‡Œ
        session.setAttribute("message", "é¡µé¢å‚æ•°ä¸ä¸ºæ•°å­—ï¼");
        //è½¬å‘è‡³é”™è¯¯é¡µé¢
        request.getRequestDispatcher("Error.jsp").forward(request, response);
        return;
    }

    //åˆ¤æ–­å½“å‰é¡µé¢æ˜¯å¦æ˜¯å¤§äº0çš„
    if (curr_page <= 0)
    {
        //æŠŠé”™è¯¯ä¿¡æ¯å†™å…¥sessioné‡Œ
        session.setAttribute("message", "é¡µé¢å‚æ•°ä¸èƒ½ä¸ºè´Ÿæ•°å’Œ0ï¼");
        //è½¬å‘è‡³é”™è¯¯é¡µé¢
        request.getRequestDispatcher("Error.jsp").forward(request, response);
        return;
    }

    //è·å¾—æ€»æ¡æ•°
    Long count = table.News.getNewsCount();
    //åˆ¤æ–­å½“å‰é¡µé¢æ˜¯å¦å¤§äºé¡µæ€»æ•°
    if (curr_page > count)
    {
        //æŠŠé”™è¯¯ä¿¡æ¯å†™å…¥sessioné‡Œ
        session.setAttribute("message", "å½“å‰é¡µé¢å¤§äºé¡µé¢æ€»æ•°ï¼");
        //è½¬å‘è‡³é”™è¯¯é¡µé¢
        request.getRequestDispatcher("Error.jsp").forward(request, response);
        return;
    }

    //è·å¾—æ–°é—»
    data.News aNew = table.News.getNew(curr_page);
    if (aNew == null)
    {
        //æŠŠé”™è¯¯ä¿¡æ¯å†™å…¥sessioné‡Œ
        session.setAttribute("message", "æ–°é—»è·å–å¤±è´¥ï¼");
        //è½¬å‘è‡³é”™è¯¯é¡µé¢

%>

<%
    request.setCharacterEncoding("utf-8");
    //è·å–ä¿¡æ¯
    String no_str = request.getParameter("student_no");
    String class_no_str = request.getParameter("class_no");
//        String name = request.getParameter("name");
//        String sex = request.getParameter("sex");
//        String telephone_number = request.getParameter("telephone_number");
//        String family_telephone_number = request.getParameter("family_telephone_number");

    //è½¬æ¢æˆæ•°å­—
    Long no = null;
    try
    {
        assert no_str != null;
        no = Long.parseLong(no_str);
    }
    catch (Exception e)
    {
        //æŠŠé”™è¯¯ä¿¡æ¯å†™å…¥sessioné‡Œ
        session.setAttribute("message", "å­¦å·ä¸ä¸ºæ•°å­—ï¼");
        //è½¬å‘è‡³é”™è¯¯é¡µé¢
        request.getRequestDispatcher("Error.jsp").forward(request, response);
        return;
    }
    Long class_no = null;
    try
    {
        assert class_no_str != null;
        class_no = Long.parseLong(class_no_str);
    }
    catch (Exception e)
    {
        //æŠŠé”™è¯¯ä¿¡æ¯å†™å…¥sessioné‡Œ
        session.setAttribute("message", "ç­çº§ç¼–å·ä¸ä¸ºæ•°å­—ï¼");
        //è½¬å‘è‡³é”™è¯¯é¡µé¢
        request.getRequestDispatcher("Error.jsp").forward(request, response);
        return;
    }

    //åˆ é™¤
    boolean result = table.Student.delete(no);
    if (!result)
    {
        //æŠŠé”™è¯¯ä¿¡æ¯å†™å…¥sessioné‡Œ
        session.setAttribute("message", "å­¦ç”Ÿä¿¡æ¯åˆ é™¤å¤±è´¥ï¼");
        //è½¬å‘è‡³é”™è¯¯é¡µé¢
        request.getRequestDispatcher("Error.jsp").forward(request, response);
        return;
    }
%>
